    269                                                      genvar i ;
    270                                                      for (i = 0 ; i < i_no_of_targets ; i = i + 1) begin
    271                                                          reg [63:0] CCC_Table [no_of_unq_ccc_sup:0][i] ;
    272                                                      end 
    273                                                  endgenerate
    274                                              
    275                                              */
    276                                              
    277                                              
    278                                              //////////////////////////////////////// Direct or Broadcat detection  ///////////////////////////////////////////////
    279                                              
    280                                              // we have 16 required CCC to support at ground level 
    281                                              
    282                                              // to determine whether it's a Direct or Broadcast 
    283             1                       9365         always @(*) begin 
    284                                                      case (i_regf_CMD) 
    285             1                        637                 8'h80 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // ENEC     
    286             1                        623                 8'h81 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // DISEC       
    287             1                        645                 8'h89 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // SETMWL        
    288             1                        609                 8'h8A : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // SETMRL        
    289             1                        614                 8'h8B : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETMWL          
    290             1                        598                 8'h8C : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETMRL        
    291             1                        606                 8'h90 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETSTATUS  
    292             1                        619                 8'h8D : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETPID       
    293             1                        620                 8'h8E : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETBCR        
    294             1                        626                 8'h8F : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETDCR      
    295                                              
    296             1                        656                 8'h00 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;   // ENEC      (broadcast version)
    297             1                        591                 8'h01 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;   // DISEC     (broadcast version)
    298             1                        619                 8'h09 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;   // SETMWL    (broadcast version)
    299             1                        657                 8'h0A : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;   // SETMRL    (broadcast version)
    300                                                         
    301                                              
    302             1                        645                 8'h1F : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;    // Dummy CCC value for end procedure
    303             1                    ***0***                 default : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;  // broadcast by default
    304                                                      endcase
    305                                                  end
    306                                              
    307             1                     368050      always @ (posedge i_sys_clk or negedge i_sys_rst) begin 
    308                                                  if (!i_sys_rst) begin
    309             1                          1             tmp_shift <= 10'd0 ;
    310             1                          1             Direct_Broadcast_n_del <= 1'b0 ;
    311                                                  end 
    312                                                  else if (next_state == IDLE) begin 
    313             1                      22911             Direct_Broadcast_n_del <= 1'b0 ;
    314             1                      22911             tmp_shift <= 10'd0 ;
    315                                                  end 
    316                                                  else begin 
    317                                                      if (i_engine_en) begin 
    318             1                     345137                 tmp_shift[0] <= Direct_Broadcast_n ;
    319             1                     345137                 tmp_shift[9:1] <= tmp_shift [8:0] ;
    320             1                     345137                 Direct_Broadcast_n_del <= tmp_shift[9] ; // delayed 8 system clk cycles 
    321                                                      end 
    322                                                      else begin 
    323             1                          1                 Direct_Broadcast_n_del <= 1'b0 ;
    324             1                          1                 tmp_shift <= 10'd0 ;
    325                                                      end  
    326                                                  end   
    327                                              end 
    328                                              
    329                                              // Defining Byte identification 
    330             1                       7548         always @(*) begin 
    331                                                      if      (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0] && i_regf_DBP)                                                         
    332             1                    ***0***                 Defining_byte = 1'b1;  // regular 
    333                                                      else if ( i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0] && ( i_regf_DTT == 3'd5 ||  i_regf_DTT == 3'd6 || i_regf_DTT == 3'd7))  
    334             1                    ***0***                 Defining_byte = 1'b1 ; // immediate      
    335                                                      else                                                                                                
    336             1                       7548                 Defining_byte = 1'b0 ;
    337                                                  end 
    338                                              
    339                                              
    340                                              // Pulse stretcher 
    341                                              reg [1:0] pulse_counter ;  
    342                                              reg       i_sclstall_stall_done_strtch ;
    343                                              
    344             1                     116322     always @(posedge i_sys_clk or negedge i_sys_rst) begin
    345                                                  if (!i_sys_rst) begin
    346             1                          1             pulse_counter                 <= 2'b00 ;
    347             1                          1             i_sclstall_stall_done_strtch  <= 1'b0 ;
    348                                                  end 
    349                                                  else begin
    350                                                      if (i_sclstall_stall_done) begin
    351             1                      33234                 pulse_counter                <= 2'b11 ;
    352             1                      33234                 i_sclstall_stall_done_strtch <= 1'b1 ;
    353                                                      end 
    354                                                      else if (pulse_counter > 0) begin
    355             1                      49851                 pulse_counter                 <= pulse_counter - 1 ;
    356             1                      49851                 i_sclstall_stall_done_strtch <= 1'b1 ;
    357                                                      end 
    358                                                      else begin
    359             1                      33236                 i_sclstall_stall_done_strtch <= 1'b0 ;
    360                                                      end
    361                                                  end
    362                                              end
    363                                              
    364                                              //////////////////////////
    365                                              
    366                                              
    367                                              
    368                                              
    369                                              
    370                                              
    371                                              
    372                                              
    373                                              
    374                                              ////////////////////////////////////////// state memory ////////////////////////////////////////////////
    375                                              
    376             1                     579355         always @(posedge i_sys_clk or negedge i_sys_rst) begin
    377                                                      if (!i_sys_rst) begin
    378             1                          1                 current_state <= IDLE ;
    379                                                      end
    380                                                      else  begin
    381             1                     579354                 current_state <= next_state ;
    382                                                      end
    383                                                  end
    384                                              
    385                                              ///////////////////////////////// next state and output logic //////////////////////////////////////////////
    386             1                     651751         always@(*)begin
    387                                              
    388                                                  // initial values of outputs INTENTINAL LATCH that can be easily removed if STA analysis is fired 
    389                                              
    390             1                     651751         o_sclstall_en              = 1'b0 ;  
    391             1                     651751         o_sclstall_code            = 8'b0 ; 
    392             1                     651751         o_tx_en                    = 1'b0 ; 
    393             1                     651751         o_tx_mode                  = 4'b0 ; 
    394             1                     651751         o_rx_en                    = 1'b0 ; 
    395             1                     651751         o_rx_mode                  = 3'b0 ; 
    396             1                     651751         o_bitcnt_en                = 1'b1 ; 
    397             1                     651751         o_bitcnt_err_rst           = 1'b0 ; 
    398             1                     651751         o_sdahand_pp_od            = 1'b1 ; // 1 means PP
    399             1                     651751         o_regf_wr_en               = 1'b0 ;
    400             1                     651751         o_regf_rd_en               = 1'b0 ;
    401             1                     651751         o_engine_done              = 1'b0 ;
    402                                                  //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    403                                                  //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    404             1                     651751         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    405                                              
    406                                              
    407                                                      case (current_state)
    408                                              
    409                                                          IDLE : begin                     // aw arbitration if needed  
    410                                                              // sampling the configuration once a sequence
    411                                                              
    412             1                      34290                     i_regf_RnW       = i_i_regf_RnW       ;
    413             1                      34290                     i_regf_CMD_ATTR  = i_i_regf_CMD_ATTR  ;
    414             1                      34290                     i_regf_CMD       = i_i_regf_CMD       ;
    415             1                      34290                     i_regf_DEV_INDEX = i_i_regf_DEV_INDEX ;
    416             1                      34290                     i_regf_TOC       = i_i_regf_TOC       ;
    417             1                      34290                     i_regf_WROC      = i_i_regf_WROC      ;
    418             1                      34290                     i_regf_DTT       = i_i_regf_DTT       ;
    419             1                      34290                     i_regf_DBP       = i_i_regf_DBP       ;
    420             1                      34290                     i_regf_SRE       = i_i_regf_SRE       ;
    421                                              
    422             1                      34290                     first_time        = 1'b1 ;   // flag to help to differentiate between the direct and broadcast with assistance of Direct_Braodcast_n flag 
    423             1                      34290                     o_bitcnt_en       = 1'b0 ;
    424             1                      34290                     regular_counter   = 'd8  ;   // data starts from ninth location
    425             1                      34290                     immediate_counter = 'd4  ;   // data starts from forth location
    426             1                      34290                     o_engine_odd      = 1'b0 ;
    427             1                      34290                     controller_abort  = 1'b0 ;
    428             1                      34290                     o_tx_en           = 1'b0 ;
    429             1                      34290                     o_frmcnt_en       = 1'b0 ;
    430                                                              //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    431                                                              //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    432             1                      34290                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    433                                              
    434                                                              if (i_engine_en) begin 
    435             1                      19855                         next_state = PRE_CMD ;
    436                                                                  //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    437                                                                  //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    438             1                      19855                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    439             1                      19855                         o_tx_en    = 1'b1 ; 
    440             1                      19855                         o_tx_mode  = special_preamble ; 
    441                                                              end
    442                                                              else begin 
    443             1                      14435                         next_state = IDLE ;
    444                                                              end 
    445                                              
    446                                              /*
    447                                                              //laila edit
    448                                                              if(i_regf_TOC == 1'b1 && exit_setup == 1'b1)
    449                                                                  begin
    450                                                                      o_tx_en = 1'b1;
    451                                                                      o_tx_mode = zero
    452                                                                  end
    453                                                              else 
    454                                                                  begin
    455                                                                  end
    456                                                                  
    457                                                              end
    458                                              */
    459                                                          end 
    460                                              
    461                                                          PRE_CMD : begin // i'm driving the 2 bits with 2'b01
    462                                                              if (i_engine_en) begin 
    463             1                      68576                         o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ; 
    464             1                      68576                         o_tx_mode = special_preamble ; 
    465                                              
    466                                                                  //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    467                                                                  //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    468             1                      68576                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    469                                              
    470                                                                  
    471                                              
    472                                                                  ///////////////// first cmd word direct or broadcast that's the point of the delay >> always sees the first cmd as broadcast////////////////////////
    473                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done && !i_frmcnt_last_frame && !Direct_Broadcast_n_del && first_time) begin   
    474             1                      10001                             next_state = RNW ;
    475                                                                  end
    476                                                                  //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    477                                              
    478                                                                  ///////////////////////// first crc direct  ///////////////////////////
    479                                                                  else if (i_tx_mode_done && !i_frmcnt_last_frame && Direct_Broadcast_n_del && first_time) begin   
    480             1                       6617                             next_state = C_TOKEN_STATE ;
    481                                                                  end 
    482                                                                  //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    483                                              
    484                                                                  ////////////////////// Second cmd word direct //////////////
    485                                                                  else if (i_tx_mode_done && !i_frmcnt_last_frame && Direct_Broadcast_n_del && !first_time) begin   
    486             1                       6617                             next_state = RNW ;
    487                                                                  end
    488                                                                  //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    489                                              
    490                                                                  ///////////////////////// last crc direct ///////////////////////////
    491                                                                  else if (i_tx_mode_done && i_frmcnt_last_frame && Direct_Broadcast_n_del && !first_time ) begin   
    492             1                       2670                             next_state = C_TOKEN_STATE ;
    493                                                                  end 
    494                                                                  //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    495                                              
    496                                                                  ///////////////////////// last crc broadcast ///////////////////////////
    497                                                                  else if (i_tx_mode_done && i_frmcnt_last_frame && !Direct_Broadcast_n_del && !first_time ) begin   
    498             1                    ***0***                             next_state = C_TOKEN_STATE ;
    499                                                                  end 
    500                                                                  //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    501                                              
    502                                                                  ///////////////////////// last crc broadcast special for dummy case ///////////////////////////
    503                                                                  else if (i_tx_mode_done && i_frmcnt_last_frame && !Direct_Broadcast_n_del && first_time ) begin   
    504             1                       3383                             next_state = C_TOKEN_STATE ;
    505                                                                  end 
    506                                                                  //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    507                                              
    508                                                                  else begin 
    509             1                      39288                             next_state = PRE_CMD ;
    510                                                                  end
    511                                                              end 
    512                                                              else begin
    513             1                       4860                         next_state = IDLE ;
    514                                                              end
    515                                                          end 
    516                                              
    517                                                          PRE_CRC_TARGET : begin // target is driving the 2 bits with 2'b01
    518                                                              if (i_engine_en) begin
    519             1                       7896                         o_rx_en   = 1'b1 ; 
    520                                                                  //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b1 ;
    521                                                                  //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b1 ;
    522             1                       7896                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b1 ;
    523             1                       7896                         o_rx_mode                 = CRC_PREAMBLE ;   //o_rx_mode = parity_check ;
    524                                              
    525                                                                  if ((i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_error) && i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    526             1                       3947                             next_state = C_TOKEN_STATE ;
    527                                                                  end
    528                                                                  else if (i_rx_mode_done && i_rx_error ) begin  // at reading operation with matched data length    HENA BARDO PUT THE CONDITION (i_rx_mode_done && rx_err)
    529             1                    ***0***                             next_state = ERROR ;
    530             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS = FRAME ;
    531                                                                  end
    532                                                                  else begin 
    533             1                       3949                             next_state = PRE_CRC_TARGET ;
    534                                                                  end
    535                                                              end 
    536                                                              else begin 
    537             1                    ***0***                         next_state = IDLE ;
    538                                                              end 
    539                                                          end 
    540                                              
    541                                                          RNW : begin
    542             1                      33236                     o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    543                                                              //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    544                                                              //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    545             1                      33236                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    546                                              
    547                                                              if (first_time) begin 
    548             1                      20002                         o_tx_mode = zero ;
    549                                                              end 
    550                                                              else begin 
    551             1                       7894                         if (i_regf_RnW) o_tx_mode = one  ; // read 
    552             1                       5340                         else            o_tx_mode = zero  ; // write 
    553                                                              end
    554                                                              // state transition
    555                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    556             1                      16618                         next_state = RESERVED ;
    557                                                              end
    558                                                              else begin 
    559             1                      16618                         next_state = RNW ;
    560                                                              end
    561                                                          end 
    562                                              
    563                                              
    564                                                          RESERVED : begin
    565             1                      39853                     o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    566                                                              //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    567                                                              //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;    
    568             1                      39853                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    569             1                      39853                     o_tx_mode = seven_zeros ;
    570                                                              
    571                                                              // state transition
    572                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    573             1                      16617                         next_state = SECOND_CMD_BYTE ;
    574                                                              end
    575                                              /*              
    576                                              //laila
    577                                              if (first_time) begin 
    578                                                                  o_txrx_addr_ccc = SEVEN_E ;                    
    579                                                              end
    580                                               else if (Direct_Broadcast_n_del && !first_time) begin

    586                                              end
    587                                              */
    588                                              
    589                                              
    590                                              
    591                                                              else begin 
    592             1                      23236                         next_state = RESERVED ;
    593                                                              end
    594                                                          end 
    595                                              
    596                                                          SECOND_CMD_BYTE : begin  // contains either 7E or any target address 
    597             1                      33880                     o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ; 
    598                                                              //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    599                                                              //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    600             1                      33880                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    601                                                              if (first_time) begin 
    602                                              
    603             1                      20000                         o_tx_mode = serializing_address ;
    604             1                      20000                         o_txrx_addr_ccc = SEVEN_E ;
    605                                              
    606                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    607             1                      10000                             next_state = PARITY_CMD ;
    608                                                                  end
    609                                                                  else begin 
    610             1                      10000                             next_state = SECOND_CMD_BYTE ;
    611                                                                  end       
    612                                                              end 
    613                                                              else if (Direct_Broadcast_n_del && !first_time) begin 
    614             1                      13880                         o_frmcnt_en     = 1'b1 ;                    // new 
    615             1                      13880                         o_tx_mode       = serializing_address ;
    616             1                      13880                         o_txrx_addr_ccc = target_addres ;
    617                                              
    618                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    619             1                       6617                             next_state = PARITY_CMD ;
    620                                                                  end
    621                                                                  else begin 
    622             1                       7263                             next_state = SECOND_CMD_BYTE ;
    623                                                                  end
    624                                              
    625                                                              end 
    626                                                              else begin 
    627             1                    ***0***                         o_tx_mode       = serializing_address ;
    628             1                    ***0***                         o_txrx_addr_ccc = target_addres ;
    629                                                                  
    630                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    631             1                    ***0***                             next_state = PARITY_CMD ;
    632                                                                  end
    633                                                                  else begin 
    634             1                    ***0***                             next_state = SECOND_CMD_BYTE ;
    635                                                                  end
    636                                                              end 
    637                                                          end
    638                                              
    639                                                          PARITY_CMD : begin 
    640             1                      33234                     o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ; 
    641                                                              //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    642                                                              //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    643             1                      33234                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    644             1                      33234                     o_tx_mode = parity_calc ;
    645                                              
    646                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    647             1                      16617                         next_state   = PRE_FIRST_DATA_ONE ;
    648                                                                  //o_frmcnt_en  = 1'b1 ;
    649                                                              end
    650                                                              else begin 
    651             1                      16617                         next_state = PARITY_CMD ;
    652                                                              end
    653                                              
    654                                                              // erorr state condition is remaining 
    655                                              
    656                                                          end
    657                                              
    658                                              
    659                                                          PRE_FIRST_DATA_ONE : begin // should be 10 to mean ACK ,    and 11 is NACK
    660                                                          
    661             1                      33234                     o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    662                                                              //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    663                                                              //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    664             1                      33234                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    665             1                      33234                     o_tx_mode = one ;
    666             1                      33234                     o_rx_en   = 1'b0 ;
    667                                              
    668                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done) begin
    669             1                      16617                         next_state = PRE_FIRST_DATA_TWO ;
    670                                                                  //o_rx_en    = 1'b1 ;
    671                                                                  //o_rx_mode  = preamble_rx_mode ;
    672                                                              end
    673                                                              else begin

    675                                                              end 
    676                                                          
    677                                                          end 
    678                                              
    679                                                          PRE_FIRST_DATA_TWO : begin 
    680

    682                                                              //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b1 ;
