    685             1                      33234                     o_rx_mode = preamble_rx_mode ;
    686                                              
    687                                                              if (i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_pre && first_time) begin
    688             1                      10000                         next_state = CCC_BYTE ;
    689             1                      10000                         o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    690                                              
    691                                                                  //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    692                                                                  //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    693             1                      10000                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    694             1                      10000                         o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_port ;
    695             1                      10000                         o_txrx_addr_ccc = i_regf_CMD ;
    696                                                              end
    697                                              
    698                                                              else if (i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_pre && !first_time) begin 
    699                                                              
    700                                                                  if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0] && !i_regf_RnW) begin              // if regular command discriptor  (but long write) not required cuurently but it's okk
    701             1                    ***0***                             o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ;
    702             1                    ***0***                             o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    703                                                                      //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    704                                                                      //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    705             1                    ***0***                             o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;                        
    706             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 8 to point to the ninth location 
    707             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_wr_en = 1'b1 ;                
    708                                                                  end
    709                                                                  else if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0] && i_regf_RnW) begin              // if Read & Regular command discriptor  
    710             1                       3947                             o_tx_en   = 1'b0 ;
    711             1                       3947                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 8 to point to the ninth location                 
    712                                                                  end
    713                                              
    714                                                                  else begin // if immediate
    715             1                       2670                             o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    716                                                                                                    
    717                                                                      if (Defining_byte) begin 
    718             1                    ***0***                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter + 1  ; // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to sixth location
    719             1                    ***0***                                 o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ;          // as first byte in the third location will contain the Defining Byte
    720                                                                      end 
    721                                                                      else begin 
    722             1                       2670                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter ;        // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to fourth location
    723             1                       2670                                 o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ; 
    724                                                                      end 
    725                                                                  end
    726                                              
    727             1                       6617                         next_state   = FIRST_DATA_BYTE ;
    728             1                       6617                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    729                                                              end 
    730                                              
    731                                                              else if (i_rx_mode_done && i_rx_pre) begin 
    732             1                    ***0***                         o_tx_en           = 1'b0 ;
    733             1                    ***0***                         next_state        = ERROR ;
    734             1                    ***0***                         o_regf_ERR_STATUS = NACK ;
    735                                                              end 
    736                                              
    737                                                              else begin 
    738             1                      16617                         next_state = PRE_FIRST_DATA_TWO ;
    739                                                              end 
    740                                              
    741                                              
    742                                              
    743                                              
    744                                                              // new 12/6/2024 
    745                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW) begin  // write operation 
    746             1                      17446                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    747                                                                  if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              // if regular command discriptor 
    748             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 8 to point to the ninth location 
    749                                                                  end 
    750                                                                  else begin                                  // if immediate
    751                                                                      if (Defining_byte) begin 
    752             1                    ***0***                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter + 1  ; // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to sixth location
    753                                                                      end 
    754                                                                      else begin 
    755             1                      17446                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter ;        // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to fourth location
    756                                                                      end 
    757                                                                  end 
    758                                                              end 
    759                                                          end 
    760                                              
    761                                              
    762                                              
    763                                                          CCC_BYTE : begin    // contains CCC value
    764                                              
    765             1                      20000                     o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    766                                                              //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    767                                                              //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    768             1                      20000                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;                
    769             1                      20000                     o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_port ;
    770             1                      20000                     o_txrx_addr_ccc = i_regf_CMD ;
    771                                              
    772                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done && Defining_byte) begin   // if a defining byte exists
    773             1                    ***0***                         next_state = DEFINING_BYTE ;
    774             1                    ***0***                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    775             1                    ***0***                         o_regf_addr  = first_location + 4 ;
    776                                                              end
    777                                                              else if (i_tx_mode_done && !Defining_byte) begin
    778             1                      10000                         o_regf_addr  = first_location - 1  ;               // laila edit 
    779             1                      10000                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;  
    780             1                      10000                         next_state = ZEROS ;
    781                                                              end 
    782                                                              else begin 
    783             1                      10000                         next_state = CCC_BYTE ;
    784                                                              end
    785                                              
    786                                                          end
    787                                              
    788                                                          DEFINING_BYTE : begin    // contains definaing byte if exist
    789             1                    ***0***                     o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    790                                                              //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    791                                                              //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    792             1                    ***0***                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;                
    793             1                    ***0***                     o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ; 
    794             1                    ***0***                     o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    795             1                    ***0***                     o_regf_addr  = first_location + 4 ;                 // fifth location (8 bits width)
    796             1                    ***0***                     o_frmcnt_en  = 1'b1 ;
    797                                              
    798                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done) begin   
    799             1                    ***0***                         next_state = PARITY_DATA ;
    800                                                              end
    801                                                              else begin 
    802             1                    ***0***                         next_state = DEFINING_BYTE ;
    803                                                              end  
    804                                                          end
    805                                              
    806                                                          ZEROS : begin                               // eight zeros fixed at regfile (e.g location 999)
    807             1                      28169                     o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    808                                                              //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    809                                                              //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    810             1                      28169                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    811             1                      28169                     o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ; 
    812             1                      28169                     o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    813             1                      28169                     o_regf_addr  = first_location - 1  ;
    814                                              
    815                                                              // new (instead of just o_frmcnt_en  = 1'b1 ;)
    816                                                              if (Direct_Broadcast_n_del && first_time) begin 
    817             1                      13234                         o_frmcnt_en  = 1'b0 ;
    818                                                              end
    819                                                              else begin 
    820             1                      14935                         o_frmcnt_en  = 1'b1 ;
    821                                                              end  
    822                                                              //////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    823                                                              if (i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    824             1                       9042                         o_engine_odd = 1'b1 ; 
    825                                                              end 
    826                                                              else begin 
    827             1                      19127                         o_engine_odd = 1'b0 ; 
    828                                                              end 
    829                                              
    830                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done) begin   
    831             1                      13648                         next_state = PARITY_DATA ;
    832                                              
    833                                                              end
    834                                                              else begin 
    835             1                      14521                         next_state = ZEROS ;
    836                                                              end
    837                                              
    838                                                              // erorr state condition is remaining   
    839                                                          end
    840                                              
    841                                                          PARITY_DATA : begin // parity state any Data word
    842                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW || first_time) begin // write 
    843             1                      33382                         o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    844                                                                  //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    845                                                                  //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    846             1                      33382                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    847                                              
    848                                              
    849             1                      33382                         o_tx_mode = parity_calc ;
    850                                                                  if  (i_tx_mode_done) begin // if broadcast
    851                                              
    852                                                                      if (i_frmcnt_last_frame || (Direct_Broadcast_n_del & first_time)) begin  // crc state only in case of Direct or in case of last data 
    853             1                      12670                                 next_state = PRE_CMD ; // BEGINING OF CRC 
    854                                                                      end 
    855                                                                      else begin 
    856             1                       4021                                 next_state = PRE_DATA_ONE ; // not last byte then continue sending/recieving repeated data 
    857                                                                      end 
    858                                                                  end
    859                                              
    860                                                                  else begin 
    861             1                      16691                             next_state = PARITY_DATA ;
    862                                                                  end
    863                                                              end 
    864                                                              else begin // read 
    865             1                      13806                         o_rx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    866             1                      13806                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b1 ;
    867                                                                  //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b1 ;
    868             1                      13806                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b1 ;
    869             1                      13806                         o_rx_mode = parity_check ;
    870                                                                  if  (i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_error) begin 
    871                                              
    872                                                                      if (i_frmcnt_last_frame || (Direct_Broadcast_n_del && first_time)) begin  // crc state only in case of Direct or in case of last data 
    873             1                       3947                                 next_state = PRE_CRC_TARGET ; // 
    874                                                                      end
    875                                                                      else if (i_frmcnt_last_frame || (Direct_Broadcast_n_del && !first_time)) begin // read case with more than 2 data bytes
    876             1                       2956                                 next_state = PRE_DATA_ONE ;
    877                                                                      end  
    878                                                                      else begin 
    879             1                    ***0***                                 next_state = PRE_DATA_ONE ; // not last byte then continue sending/recieving repeated data 
    880                                              
    881                                                                      end 
    882                                                                  end
    883                                              
    884                                                                  else if (i_rx_mode_done && i_rx_error) begin 
    885             1                    ***0***                             next_state = ERROR ;
    886             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS = PARITY_ERR ;
    887                                                                  end 
    888                                              
    889                                                                  else begin 
    890             1                       6903                             next_state = PARITY_DATA ;
    891                                                                  end
    892                                                              end 
    893                                                          end
    894                                              
    895                                                          PRE_DATA_ONE : begin  //  11  means ok continue , and 10 to be aborted 
    896                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW) begin // write 
    897             1                       8042                         o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    898                                                                  //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    899                                                                  //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    900             1                       8042                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;                 
    901             1                       8042                         o_tx_mode = one ;
    902             1                       8042                         o_rx_en   = 1'b0 ;
    903                                              
    904                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done) begin
    905             1                       4021                             next_state = PRE_DATA_TWO ;
    906                                                                      //o_rx_en  = 1'b1 ;
    907                                                                      //o_rx_mode = preamble_rx_mode ;
    908                                                                  end
    909                                                                  else begin 
    910             1                       4021                             next_state = PRE_DATA_ONE ;
    911                                                                  end 
    912                                                              end 
    913                                              
    914                                                              else begin 
    915             1                       5912                         o_tx_en   = 1'b0 ;
    916             1                       5912                         o_rx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    917                                                                 // o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b1 ;
    918                                                                  //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b1 ;
    919             1                       5912                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b1 ;
    920             1                       5912                         o_rx_mode = preamble_rx_mode ;
    921                                                                  
    922                                                                  if (i_rx_mode_done && i_rx_pre) begin
    923             1                       2956                             next_state = PRE_DATA_TWO ;
    924             1                       2956                             o_rx_mode  = preamble_rx_mode ;
    925                                                                  end
    926                                                                  else if (i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_pre) begin
    927             1                    ***0***                             next_state = ERROR ;
    928             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS  = FRAME ;
    929                                                                  end
    930                                                                  else begin 
    931             1                       2956                             next_state = PRE_DATA_ONE ;
    932                                                                  end 
    933                                                              end 
    934                                                          end 
    935                                              
    936                                                          PRE_DATA_TWO : begin 
    937                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW) begin // write
    938             1                       8042                         o_tx_en   = 1'b0 ;
    939             1                       8042                         o_rx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    940             1                       8042                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b1 ;
    941                                                                  //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b1 ;
    942             1                       8042                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b1 ;
    943             1                       8042                         o_rx_mode = preamble_rx_mode ;
    944                                              
    945                                                                  if (i_rx_mode_done && i_rx_pre) begin  // ack by target
    946             1                       4021                             next_state = FIRST_DATA_BYTE ;
    947                                                                  ////////////////////////////////// new ////////////////////////////////
    948             1                       4021                             o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    949                                                                      //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    950                                                                      //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    951             1                       4021                             o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    952             1                       4021                             o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    953                                                                      if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              // if regular command discriptor  
    954             1                    ***0***                                 o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ;
    955             1                    ***0***                                 o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 8 to point to the ninth location 
    956                                                                      end 
    957                                                                      else begin                                  // if immediate
    958                                                                          if (Defining_byte) begin 
    959             1                    ***0***                                     o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter + 1  ; // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to sixth location
    960                                                  
    961             1                    ***0***                                     o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ;          // as first byte in the third location will contain the Defining Byte
    962                                                                          end 
    963                                                                          else begin 
    964             1                       4021                                     o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter ;        // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to fourth location
    965             1                       4021                                     o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ; 
    966                                                                          end 
    967                                                                      end 
    968                                                                  //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    969                                                                  end
    970                                              
    971                                                                  else if (i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_pre) begin // abort by target
    972             1                    ***0***                             next_state        = ERROR ;
    973             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS = T_ABORTED ;
    974                                                                  end 
    975                                              
    976                                                                  else begin 
    977             1                       4021                             next_state = PRE_DATA_TWO ;
    978                                                                  end 
    979                                                              end 
    980                                                              else begin 
    981                                                                  // tx signals 
    982             1                       5912                         o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    983                                                                  //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    984                                                                  //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    985             1                       5912                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    986                                                                  if (controller_abort) begin 
    987             1                    ***0***                             o_tx_mode = zero ;
    988                                                                  end 
    989                                                                  else begin 
    990             1                       5912                             o_tx_mode = one ;                   // open drain
    991                                                                      //o_sdahand_pp_od = open drain ; 
    992                                                                  end
    993                                              
    994                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done) begin  
    995             1                       2956                             next_state = FIRST_DATA_BYTE ;
    996                                                                  end
    997                                              
    998                                                                 
    999                                              
    1000                                                                 else begin 
    1001            1                       2956                             next_state = PRE_DATA_TWO ;
    1002                                                                 end
    1003                                                             end 
    1004                                             
    1005                                             
    1006                                                             // new 12/6/2024 
    1007                                                             if (!i_regf_RnW) begin  // write operation 
    1008            1                       8042                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    1009                                                                 if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              // if regular command discriptor 
    1010            1                    ***0***                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 8 to point to the ninth location 
    1011                                                                 end 
    1012                                                                 else begin                                  // if immediate
    1013                                                                     if (Defining_byte) begin 
    1014            1                    ***0***                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter + 1  ; // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to sixth location
    1015                                                                     end 
    1016                                                                     else begin 
    1017            1                       8042                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter ;        // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to fourth location
    1018                                                                     end 
    1019                                                                 end 
    1020                                                             end 
    1021                                                             
    1022                                                         end                     
    1023                                             
    1024                                             
    1025                                             
    1026                                                         FIRST_DATA_BYTE : begin    // contains first repeated data byte
    1027                                                             if (!i_regf_RnW) begin  // write operation 
    1028            1                      16384                         o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    1029                                                                 //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    1030                                                                 //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    1031            1                      16384                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    1032            1                      16384                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    1033                                                                 if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              // if regular command discriptor  
    1034            1                    ***0***                             o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ;
    1035            1                    ***0***                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 8 to point to the ninth location 
    1036                                                                 end 
    1037                                                                 else begin                                  // if immediate
    1038                                                                     if (Defining_byte) begin 
    1039            1                    ***0***                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter + 1  ; // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to sixth location
    1040                                                 
    1041            1                    ***0***                                 o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ;          // as first byte in the third location will contain the Defining Byte
    1042                                                                     end 
    1043                                                                     else begin 
    1044            1                      16384                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter ;        // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to fourth location
    1045            1                      16384                                 o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ; 
    1046                                                                     end 
    1047                                                                 end 
    1048                                                             end 
    1049                                             
    1050                                                             // read operation 
    1051                                                             else begin 
    1052                                                             //////////////// new 3/5/2024 
    1053                                                             if (i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    1054            1                       1988                         o_engine_odd = 1'b1 ; 
    1055                                                             end 
    1056                                                             else begin 
    1057            1                      19715                         o_engine_odd = 1'b0 ; 
    1058                                                             end 
    1059                                                             ///////////////////////////////////////// 
    1060            1                      21703                     o_rx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    1061            1                      21703                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b1 ;
    1062                                                             //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b1 ;
    1063            1                      21703                     o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b1 ;
    1064            1                      21703                     o_regf_wr_en = 1'b1 ;
    1065                                                                 if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              // if regular command discriptor  
    1066            1                      21703                             o_rx_mode    = deserializing_byte ;
    1067            1                      21703                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 4 to point to the fifth location 
    1068                                                                 end 
    1069                                                                 else begin  // there is no immediate case in the read operation 
    1070            1                    ***0***                             next_state = ERROR ;
    1071            1                    ***0***                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS = FRAME ;
    1072                                                                 end 
    1073                                                             end
    1074                                             
    1075                                                             // for both read and write 
    1076                                                             if (i_tx_mode_done && i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin  // to handle odd number of bytes in both regular and immediate
    1077            1                       3648                         next_state   = ZEROS ;
    1078            1                       3648                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    1079            1                       3648                         o_regf_addr  = first_location - 1 ; 
    1080                                                                 //o_engine_odd = 1'b1 ;            // to be put in the response discreptor      
    1081                                                             end
    1082                                             
    1083                                                             //// new 3/5/2024
    1084                                                             else if (i_rx_mode_done && i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    1085            1                        994                         next_state = SECOND_DATA_BYTE ; 
    1086                                                                 //immediate_counter = immediate_counter + 1 ;  there can't be immediate Transfer Command Discriptor with direct get 
    1087            1                        994                         regular_counter   = regular_counter + 1 ;
    1088                                                                 end
    1089                                             
    1090                                                              
    1091                                                             /////////////////////
    1092                                             
    1093                                                             else if ((i_rx_mode_done | i_tx_mode_done) && !i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin  
    1094            1                       8952                         next_state = SECOND_DATA_BYTE ; 
    1095            1                       8952                         immediate_counter = immediate_counter + 1 ;
    1096            1                       8952                         regular_counter   = regular_counter + 1 ;
    1097                                             
    1098                                             
    1099                                             // 12/6/2024
    1100                                                                 if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              
    1101            1                       5909                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; 
    1102                                                                 end 
    1103                                                                 else begin
    1104            1                       3043                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + immediate_counter ;
    1105                                                                 end 
    1106                                                                 /////////////////
    1107                                                             end
    1108                                             
    1109                                             
    1110                                                             
    1111                                                             else begin 
    1112            1                      24493                         next_state = FIRST_DATA_BYTE ;                  
    1113                                                             end
    1114                                             
    1115                                                         end
    1116                                             
    1117                                             
    1118                                                         SECOND_DATA_BYTE : begin   // contains second repeated data byte
    1119                                                             if (!i_regf_RnW) begin // write operation 
    1120            1                       7618                         o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    1121                                                                 //o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b0 ;
    1122                                                                 //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b0 ;
    1123            1                       7618                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc   = 1'b0 ;
    1124            1                       7618                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    1125            1                       7618                         o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ;
    1126                                                                 if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              // if regular command discriptor  
    1127            1                    ***0***                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; 
    1128                                                                 end
    1129                                                                 else begin 
    1130            1                       7618                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + immediate_counter ; 
    1131                                                                 end 
    1132                                                                 if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    1133            1                       3043                             next_state = PARITY_DATA ; 
    1134                                                                     if (i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    1135                                                                         // no need to put conditions , immediated and regular can't happen together
    1136            1                       1532                                 immediate_counter = immediate_counter ;
    1137            1                       1532                                 regular_counter   = regular_counter   ;
    1138                                                                     end 
    1139                                                                     else begin 
    1140                                                                         // no need to put conditions , immediated and regular can't happen together
    1141            1                       1511                                 immediate_counter = immediate_counter + 1 ;
    1142            1                       1511                                 regular_counter   = regular_counter   + 1 ;
    1143                                                                     end        
    1144                                                                 end
    1145                                                                 else begin 
    1146            1                       4575                             next_state = SECOND_DATA_BYTE ;                        
    1147                                                                 end 
    1148                                                             end 
    1149                                                             else begin  // read operation 
    1150                                                                 
    1151            1                      16759                         o_rx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    1152            1                      16759                         o_crc_rx_tx_mux_sel_ccc     = 1'b1 ;
    1153                                                                 //o_crc_data_rx_tx_valid_sel = 1'b1 ;

    1157                                                                 if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin                          // if regular command discriptor  
    1158            1                      16759                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; 
    1159                                                                 end
    1160                                                                 else begin  // there is no immediate case in the read operation

    1172                                             
    1173                                                                 end
    1174                                                             end

    1177                                                         C_TOKEN_STATE : begin

    1188                                                                 end 
    1189                                                                 else begin

    1191                                                                 end
