    433                                                   second_data_byte	: begin 
    434                                              
    435                                              		       if (i_rx_mode_done | i_tx_mode_done) 
    436                                              				     
    437             1                    ***0***     					 next_state = parity;
    438                                              				      
    439                                              				   else 				
    440             1                    ***0***     		          next_state = second_data_byte ;
    441                                              
    442                                                          end
    443                                              
    444                                              
    445                                              		third_stage_first_data_pre : begin 
    446                                              			  
    447                                              			
    448                                              				if (i_rx_mode_done | i_tx_mode_done)
    449                                              				  begin
    450                                              				    
    451                                              				   if(i_regf_wr_rd_bit)
    452                                              				     begin
    453                                              				       
    454                                              				         if (i_rx_pre)  								
    455             1                    ***0***     		                 next_state = abort_bit ; 
    456                                              		                 else
    457                                              						 begin
    458                                              						   if ((!i_frmcnt_last) && i_regf_short_read )  
    459             1                    ***0***     					        next_state = error ;  // target didn't send all requierd data 
    460                                              					       else 
    461             1                    ***0***     					        next_state = fourth_stage_crc_second_pre ;
    462                                                                      end
    463                                                                 
    464                                                                   end
    465                                                               
    466                                                           
    467                                              					else
    468             1                    ***0***     					next_state = abort_bit ;
    469                                                           
    470                                                           end
    471                                                            
    472                                              		     else
    473             1                    ***0***     		       next_state = third_stage_first_data_pre ;
    474                                              		       
    475                                              		     end
    476                                              
    477                                              
    478                                              			abort_bit : begin
    479                                              			 if(i_rx_mode_done | i_tx_mode_done)
    480                                              			   begin
    481                                              			
    482                                              			  	if (!i_regf_wr_rd_bit)
    483                                              				   begin
    484                                              				      
    485                                              				     if(i_rx_pre)
    486             1                    ***0***     		           next_state = first_data_byte ;
    487                                              				     else
    488                                              				      begin 
    489                                              				        
    490                                              				      /* if (i_regf_toc)
    491                                              				        next_state = restart ;
    492                                              				       else
    493                                              				        next_state = exit ;*/
    494                                              						
    495             1                    ***0***     						next_state = error;    // target aborts writing
    496                                              				        
    497                                              				      end
    498                                              				       
    499                                              				    end
    500                                              				       
    501                                              				    
    502                                              				  else
    503                                              				    begin
    504                                              				      
    505                                              				     if(i_frmcnt_last) 
    506                                              				       
    507                                              		          begin 
    508                                              				        
    509                                              				      /* if (!i_regf_toc)
    510                                              				        next_state = restart ;
    511                                              				       else
    512                                              				        next_state = exit ;*/
    513             1                    ***0***     						next_state = error;     // Controller aborts reading
    514                                              						
    515                                              				        
    516                                              				      end
    517                                              		           
    518                                              				     else 
    519             1                    ***0***     				       next_state = first_data_byte ;
    520                                              				      
    521                                              				    end 
    522                                              				    
    523                                              			end
    524                                              				    
    525                                              				 else
    526             1                    ***0***     				   next_state = abort_bit ;
    527                                              				   
    528                                              		end
    529                                              
    530                                              
    531                                              
    532                                              			fourth_stage_crc_first_pre : begin 
    533                                              			  
    534                                              			    if (i_rx_mode_done | i_tx_mode_done)
    535             1                    ***0***     		          next_state = fourth_stage_crc_second_pre ;  
    536                                              		        else
    537             1                    ***0***     		          next_state = fourth_stage_crc_first_pre ;
    538                                              				  
    539                                              			end
    540                                              			
    541                                              			
    542                                              			fourth_stage_crc_second_pre : begin 
    543                                              			  
    544                                              			    if (i_rx_mode_done | i_tx_mode_done)
    545                                              					begin
    546                                              						if (i_regf_wr_rd_bit)
    547                                              						begin
    548                                              							if (i_rx_pre)
    549             1                    ***0***     								next_state = token_crc_bits ;
    550                                              							else 
    551             1                    ***0***     								next_state = error ;
    552                                              						end
    553                                              						
    554                                              						else 
    555             1                    ***0***     						next_state = token_crc_bits ;
    556                                              						
    557                                              						
    558                                              					end
    559                                              		        else
    560             1                    ***0***     		          next_state = fourth_stage_crc_second_pre ;
    561                                              				  
    562                                              			end
    563                                              
    564                                              
    565                                              			token_crc_bits : begin 
    566                                              				if (i_rx_mode_done | i_tx_mode_done)
    567                                              					begin
    568                                              		          
    569                                              					if (i_regf_wr_rd_bit)
    570                                              					begin
    571                                              						if (!i_rx_error)
    572             1                    ***0***     							next_state = crc_value_bits ;
    573                                              						else 
    574             1                    ***0***     							next_state = error ;
    575                                              					end
    576                                              					
    577                                              					else 
    578             1                    ***0***     					next_state = crc_value_bits ;
    579                                              					
    580                                              					end
    581                                              					
    582                                              				  
    583                                              				  
    584                                              				   
    585                                              		        else
    586             1                    ***0***     		          next_state =  token_crc_bits ;
    587                                              
    588                                              			end
    589                                              
    590                                              			crc_value_bits : begin 
    591                                              
    592                                              			 if (i_rx_mode_done | i_tx_mode_done)
    593                                              
    594                                              		       	begin				
    595                                              					if (i_regf_wr_rd_bit)
    596                                              					begin
    597                                              						
    598                                              						if (!i_rx_error) 
    599                                              						begin
    600                                              							
    601                                              							if (!i_regf_toc)
    602             1                    ***0***     								next_state = restart ;
    603                                              							else
    604             1                    ***0***     								next_state = exit ;
    605                                              						end 
    606                                              						else 
    607             1                    ***0***     							next_state = error ;
    608                                              					end
    609                                              					
    610                                              					else
    611                                              						begin
    612                                              						
    613                                              
    614                                              							if (!i_regf_toc)
    615             1                    ***0***     								next_state = restart ;
    616                                              							else
    617             1                    ***0***     								next_state = exit ;
    618                                              						 end
    619                                              					end
    620                                              				  
    621                                              
    622                                              				   
    623                                              
    624                                              		   else
    625             1                    ***0***     		       next_state = crc_value_bits ;	  
    626                                              
    627                                              			end
    628                                              
    629                                              
    630                                              			error : begin 
    631                                              
    632                                              			 if (i_rx_mode_done)
    633                                              
    634                                              		       		 begin 
    635                                              
    636                                              				       if (!i_regf_toc)
    637             1                    ***0***     				        next_state = restart ;
    638                                              				       else
    639             1                    ***0***     				        next_state = exit ;
    640                                              
    641                                              				      end
    642                                              
    643                                              		   else
    644             1                    ***0***     		       next_state = error ;	
    645                                              
    646                                              			end
    647                                              
    648                                              
    649                                              			restart :  begin
    650                                              
    651                                              		        if (i_tx_mode_done /*&& i_staller_done*/)
    652             1                    ***0***     		          next_state = idle ;  // return to idle waitng to be enabled
    653                                              		        else
    654             1                    ***0***     		          next_state = restart ;
    655                                              
    656                                              		  end 
    657                                              
    658                                              
    659                                              			exit :  begin
    660                                              
    661                                              		        if (i_tx_mode_done /*&& i_staller_done*/)
    662             1                    ***0***     		          next_state = idle ;
    663                                              		        else
    664             1                    ***0***     		          next_state = exit ;
    665                                              
    666                                              		  end 
    667                                              		  
    668             1                          2     			default : next_state = idle ;
    669                                              		  
    670                                              		  
    671                                              		/*  waiting :  begin 
    672                                              		  
    673                                              		  if (sysclk_done && i_staller_done)
    674                                              		          next_state = idle ;
    675                                              		        else
    676                                              		          next_state = waiting ;
    677                                              		  
    678                                              		  end*/
    679                                              		  
    680                                              		  
    681                                              		/*  parity_0	: begin 
    682                                              
    683                                              		        if (i_rx_mode_done | i_tx_mode_done)
    684                                              		          begin
    685                                              
    686                                              				    next_state = parity_1
    687                                              
    688                                              		  else
    689                                              		    next_state = parity_0 ;
    690                                              
    691                                                          end
    692                                              			
    693                                              			parity_1	: begin 
    694                                              
    695                                              		        if (i_rx_mode_done | i_tx_mode_done)
    696                                              		          begin
    697                                              
    698                                              				    if (i_tx_parity_data)begin	
    699                                              				          		 
    700                                              
    701                                              				           if (!i_regf_wr_rd_bit)
    702                                              				             begin
    703                                              
    704                                              				               if(!i_frmcnt_last)
    705                                              		                     next_state = third_stage_first_data_pre ;
    706                                              				               else 
    707                                              				                 next_state = fourth_stage_crc_first_pre ;
    708                                              
    709                                              					        end
    710                                              
    711                                              
    712                                              				           else begin
    713                                              
    714                                              				            if (i_rx_error) 
    715                                              				             next_state = error;
    716                                              				             
    717                                              				            else 
    718                                              				              
    719                                              				             begin
    720                                              				 
    721                                              				            if(!i_frmcnt_last)
    722                                              		                   next_state = third_stage_first_data_pre ;
    723                                              				            else 
    724                                              				               next_state = fourth_stage_crc_first_pre ;
    725                                              				               
    726                                              					           end
    727                                              				   
    728                                              
    729                                              					      end
    730                                              					      end
    731                                              
    732                                              				    
    733                                              
    734                                              
    735                                              				    else 
    736                                              				    next_state =  sec_stage_first_data_pre ;
    737                                              
    738                                              				    end
    739                                              
    740                                              
    741                                              		  else
    742                                              		    next_state = parity_1 ;
    743                                              
    744                                                          end*/
    745                                              
    746                                                   endcase
    747                                                 end
    748                                              
    749                                              
    750                                              
    751                                              
    752                                              
    753                                              
    754                                              
    755                                              
    756                                              //--------------------------- 3: Combinational Always Block For Outputs------------------------------//
    757             1                    1234838     always @(*)
    758                                               begin
    759                                              
    760             1                    1234838       o_tx_en = 'b0 ; 
    761             1                    1234838       o_rx_en = 'b0 ;
    762             1                    1234838       o_frmcnt_en = 'b1 ;
    763             1                    1234838       o_regf_wr_en = 'b0 ;
    764             1                    1234838       o_regf_rd_en = 'b0 ;
    765             1                    1234838       o_engine_done = 'b0 ;
    766             1                    1234838     	addr = 'b0;
    767             1                    1234838     	o_regf_abort = 'b0;
    768             1                    1234838     	o_sclstall_en = 'b0;
    769             1                    1234838     	o_sclstall_no_of_cycles = 'b0;
    770             1                    1234838     	o_sdahand_pp_od = 'b1;
    771             1                    1234838     	o_bitcnt_en = 'b1; 
    772             1                    1234838     	o_bitcnt_rst = 'b0;
    773             1                    1234838     	o_regf_abort = 'b0;
    774             1                    1234838     	o_regf_error_type = SUCCESS;  // No error
    775             1                    1234838     	en_sysclk=0;
    776             1                    1234838     	o_tx_mode = 'b0;
    777             1                    1234838     	o_rx_mode = 'b0 ;
    778             1                    1234838     	parity_data = 'b0;
    779             1                    1234838     	o_tx_special_data = 'd0;
    780             1                    1234838     	first_byte = 'b0;
    781                                              	//next_state = idle;
    782                                              	
    783                                              //	o_bitcnt_stop = 'b0;
    784                                              
    785                                              
    786                                                case(current_state)
    787                                              
    788                                                idle : begin 
    789                                              
    790             1                    1234835     		   o_tx_en = 'b0 ;
    791             1                    1234835                o_bitcnt_en = 'b0;
    792             1                    1234835                o_frmcnt_en = 'b0 ;
    793                                              			
    794                                              
    795                                              		  end
    796                                              
    797                                              
    798                                                first_stage_command_Pre :  begin
    799                                              
    800                                              
    801             1                    ***0***     		   o_tx_en = 'b1 ;
    802             1                    ***0***     		   o_tx_mode = special_preamble_tx ;  //01
    803             1                    ***0***     		   o_frmcnt_en = 'b0 ;
    804                                              		  
    805                                              		   
    806                                              
    807                                              		   end 
    808                                              
    809                                              
    810                                                Read_Write_bit	: begin 
    811                                              
    812             1                    ***0***     		  o_tx_en = 'b1;
    813             1                    ***0***     		  o_frmcnt_en = 'b0 ;
    814                                              			if(!i_regf_wr_rd_bit)
    815             1                    ***0***     		 o_tx_mode = zero_preamble;
    816                                              		 else 
    817             1                    ***0***     		 o_tx_mode = one_preamble;
    818                                              
    819                                              
    820                                                          end 
    821                                              			
    822                                              			
    823                                              			
    824                                                serializing_seven_zeros	: begin         // command first byte {Read_Write_bit,serializing_seven_zeros}
    825                                              
    826             1                    ***0***     		  o_tx_en = 'b1;
    827             1                    ***0***     		  o_tx_mode = seven_zeros ; 
    828             1                    ***0***     		  o_frmcnt_en = 'b0 ;
    829                                              		  
    830                                              
    831                                                          end 
    832                                              
    833                                              
    834                                                address : begin                            // command second byte {address,par_adj"calc by Tx"}
    835                                              
    836                                                       
    837             1                    ***0***     		  o_tx_en = 'b1;
    838             1                    ***0***     		  o_tx_mode = Serializing_address ;
    839             1                    ***0***     		   o_frmcnt_en = 'b1 ;
    840                                              		  
    841                                              		
    842             1                    ***0***     		  parity_data = 'b0;                  // Calculating_Parity_Command
    843                                              		
    844                                              		
    845                                              		
    846             1                    ***0***     		o_tx_special_data = {1'b0,target_addres};         
    847                                              		
    848                                              		end
    849                                              
    850                                              
    851                                                parity        : begin
    852                                              
    853                                              		//if (i_tx_mode_done)
    854             1                    ***0***     		 o_frmcnt_en = 'b1 ;
    855                                              		/* else 
    856                                              		  o_frmcnt_en = 'b0 ;*/
    857                                              
    858                                              	   if (!i_regf_wr_rd_bit)
    859                                                       begin
    860             1                    ***0***               o_tx_en = 'b1;
    861                                              		  
    862                                              		  /*if (i_tx_parity_data)
    863                                                        o_tx_mode = Calculating_Parity_Data;         
    864                                              		  else 
    865                                              		  o_tx_mode = Calculating_Parity_Command;     */
    866                                              		  
    867             1                    ***0***     		   o_tx_mode = Calculating_Parity;           // Calculating Parity for command and data
    868                                              		  
    869                                              	  
    870                                                       end
    871                                                      else
    872                                                       begin
    873                                              		  if (!Parity_data_seq)
    874                                              		  begin
    875             1                    ***0***      		  o_tx_en = 'b1;
    876             1                    ***0***     		  o_tx_mode = Calculating_Parity;
    877                                              		  end
    878                                              		  else 
    879                                              		  begin
    880             1                    ***0***               o_rx_en = 'b1;
    881             1                    ***0***               o_rx_mode = Check_Parity_value;         //check the parity correctness
    882                                                        
    883                                              		  if (i_rx_error)
    884             1                    ***0***                 o_regf_error_type = Parity_Error;
    885                                                        else
    886             1                    ***0***                 o_regf_error_type = SUCCESS; 
    887                                                       end
    888                                              		 end
    889                                              
    890                                                           end 
    891                                              
    892                                              
    893                                               sec_stage_first_data_pre : begin   // 
    894                                              
    895             1                    ***0***           o_tx_en = 'b1;
    896             1                    ***0***           o_tx_mode = one_preamble ;
    897                                              	  
    898                                              	 // o_sdahand_pp_od = 'b0; // open drain , which makes a change in scl line //to be edited
    899                                              	  
    900                                                   
    901                                                           end 
    902                                              
    903                                              
    904                                                ack_waiting : begin
    905                                              	     // new 20/6/2024 by badr 
    906                                                             
    907                                                          //addr = addr_temp +1 ;
    908                                                              
    909                                              
    910                                              		// o_sdahand_pp_od = 'b0;   //listening to sda
    911                                                   
    912             1                    ***0***     		first_byte ='b1;
    913             1                    ***0***     		en_sysclk=1;
    914             1                    ***0***     		 o_frmcnt_en = 'b1 ;
    915                                              		// wait (sysclk_done) ; // wait is unsynthesizable
    916                                                 if(sysclk_done)
    917                                              		begin
    918             1                    ***0***        		 o_rx_en = 'b1 ;
    919             1                    ***0***     	      o_rx_mode = preamble ;
    920                                              		 
    921                                              		//  o_bitcnt_stop = 'b1;
    922                                              		   
    923                                              		 
    924                                              		  
    925                                              	      if ((!i_rx_pre) && i_rx_mode_done)
    926                                              			begin
    927             1                    ***0***     			o_regf_error_type = SUCCESS;
    928                                              			if (!i_regf_wr_rd_bit) begin 
    929             1                    ***0***     			o_tx_en = 'b1;
    930             1                    ***0***     			o_tx_mode = Serializing_byte; 		    
    931             1                    ***0***     			o_regf_rd_en = 'b1 ;
    932                                              			end 
    933                                              			end
    934                                                      else 
    935                                              		begin
    936                                                       	
    937             1                    ***0***     			o_regf_error_type = NACK_Error;
    938                                              		
    939                                              		 end
    940                                              		   
    941                                              		   
    942                                              		 if (!i_regf_wr_rd_bit)
    943                                              		 begin
    944                                              		  if (i_regf_cmd_attr[0])              // Immediate Transfer
    945                                              			begin 
    946                                              			case (i_regf_dtt)
    947                                              		//	'd0 : o_regf_addr = 'd0;         // no data 
    948             1                    ***0***     			'd1 : addr = 'd1004;       // sending Byte1 of address 'd20 
    949             1                    ***0***     			'd2 : addr = 'd1004;       // sending Byte1 of address 'd20 and  sending Byte2 of address 'd21
    950             1                    ***0***     			'd3 : addr = 'd1004;		// sending Byte1 of address 'd20 and sending Byte2 of address 'd21 and sending Byte3 of address 'd22
    951             1                    ***0***     			'd4 : addr = 'd1004;		// sending Byte1 of address 'd20 and sending Byte2 of address 'd21 and sending Byte3 of address 'd22 and sending Byte3 of address 'd23
    952                                              		//	'd5 : o_regf_addr = 'd0;        // only defining byte and no data
    953                                              		//	'd6 : o_regf_addr = 'd21;       // sending defining byte and sending Byte2 of address 'd21
    954                                              		//	'd7 : o_regf_addr = 'd21;		// sending defining byte and sending Byte2 of address 'd21 and sending Byte3 of address 'd22
    955                                              			endcase
    956                                              			end
    957                                              		 else                              // Regular Transfer			 
    958             1                    ***0***     			addr = 'd1;      // starting from this address to write Regular data
    959                                              		  end 
    960                                              		   else
    961             1                    ***0***                addr = 'd10;		// starting from this address to read  Regular data
    962                                              		  
    963                                              		  
    964                                              		  end
    965                                              		  
    966                                              	else 	   		
    967             1                    ***0***     		o_rx_en = 'b0 ;
    968                                              
    969                                                           end 
    970                                              
    971                                              
    972                                                first_data_byte : begin
    973                                                   
    974             1                    ***0***     	 o_frmcnt_en = 'b1 ;
    975                                              
    976                                                  if (!i_regf_wr_rd_bit)
    977                                                    begin
    978             1                    ***0***            o_tx_en = 'b1;
    979             1                    ***0***            o_tx_mode = Serializing_byte; 		    
    980             1                    ***0***     	   o_regf_rd_en = 'b1 ;
    981                                                    end
    982                                              
    983                                                   else
    984                                                    begin
    985             1                    ***0***              o_rx_en = 'b1 ;
    986             1                    ***0***     	     o_rx_mode = Deserializing_byte ;
    987             1                    ***0***     		 o_regf_wr_en = 'b1 ;
    988                                              		 //o_sdahand_pp_od = 'b0;   //listening to sda
    989                                              	    end 
    990                                              		
    991                                              		
    992                                              	/*if (!i_frmcnt_last) 
    993                                              		count_en = 'd0;
    994                                              	else 
    995                                              		count_en = 'd1;*/
    996                                              		
    997                                              	if (first_byte_seq) begin 	
    998                                              		
    999                                              	if (i_tx_mode_done | i_rx_mode_done | i_bitcnt == 'd9  ) begin     // for increasing address to be ready 
    1000                                             		
    1001                                             		if (!i_frmcnt_last)
    1002            1                    ***0***     		addr = addr_temp + 'd1;
    1003                                             		else
    1004            1                    ***0***     		addr = specific_address;
    1005                                             		
    1006                                             		end
    1007                                             	
    1008                                             	
    1009                                             	else
    1010            1                    ***0***     		addr = addr_temp ;
    1011                                             		
    1012                                             		end
    1013                                             		
    1014                                             		
    1015                                             		
    1016                                             	else begin 
    1017                                             	if (i_tx_mode_done | i_rx_mode_done | i_bitcnt == 'd10  ) begin     // for increasing address to be ready 
    1018                                             		
    1019                                             		if (!i_frmcnt_last)
    1020            1                    ***0***     		addr = addr_temp + 'd1;
    1021                                             		else
    1022            1                    ***0***     		addr = specific_address;
    1023                                             		
    1024                                             		end
    1025                                             	
    1026                                             	
    1027                                             	else
    1028            1                    ***0***     		addr = addr_temp ;
    1029                                             		
    1030                                             		end
    1031                                             
    1032                                             		
    1033                                             
    1034                                                          end
    1035                                             			 
    1036                                             			 
    1037                                             	serializing_zeros : begin            // state of dummy data in case of odd number of bytes
    1038            1                    ***0***     	  o_frmcnt_en = 'b1 ;
    1039                                             	
    1040                                             	if (!i_regf_wr_rd_bit) 
    1041                                             	  begin 
    1042            1                    ***0***     	   o_tx_en = 'b1;
    1043            1                    ***0***            o_tx_mode = Serializing_byte;
    1044            1                    ***0***     	   addr = specific_address;
    1045                                             	   end
    1046                                             	else
    1047                                             	  begin
    1048            1                    ***0***     		o_rx_en = 'b1 ;
    1049            1                    ***0***     	    o_rx_mode = Deserializing_byte ;
    1050                                             	  end
    1051                                             	   
    1052                                             	   
    1053                                             
    1054                                             	
    1055            1                    ***0***           parity_data = 'b1;                  // Calculating Parity of Data
    1056                                                  end 	   
    1057                                             	 
    1058                                             	
    1059                                             
    1060                                             
    1061                                               second_data_byte        : begin
    1062                                                
    1063            1                    ***0***        parity_data = 'b1;                   // Calculating Parity of Data
    1064            1                    ***0***        o_frmcnt_en = 'b1 ;
    1065                                               
    1066                                               if (!i_regf_wr_rd_bit)
    1067                                                   begin
    1068            1                    ***0***            o_tx_en = 'b1;
    1069            1                    ***0***            o_tx_mode = Serializing_byte;  		    
    1070            1                    ***0***     		o_regf_rd_en = 'b1 ;
    1071                                                   end
    1072                                             
    1073                                                  else
    1074                                                   begin
    1075            1                    ***0***            o_rx_en = 'b1 ;
    1076            1                    ***0***     	     o_rx_mode = Deserializing_byte ;
    1077            1                    ***0***     		   o_regf_wr_en = 'b1 ;
    1078                                             	    end 
    1079                                             
    1080                                             	 end
    1081                                             
    1082                                             
    1083                                               third_stage_first_data_pre    : begin
    1084                                             
    1085                                                     if (!i_regf_wr_rd_bit)
    1086                                                      begin
    1087            1                    ***0***               o_tx_en = 'b1;
    1088            1                    ***0***               o_tx_mode = one_preamble;
    1089                                             		  // o_sdahand_pp_od = 'b0;  // open drain , listening to sda
    1090                                                      end
    1091                                                     else
    1092                                                      begin
    1093            1                    ***0***               o_rx_en = 'b1;
    1094            1                    ***0***               o_rx_mode = preamble;
    1095                                             		  
    1096                                             		  if (i_rx_mode_done)
    1097                                             		  begin 
    1098                                             				if (!i_rx_pre)
    1099                                             				begin
    1100                                             					 if ((!i_frmcnt_last) && i_regf_short_read ) 
    1101            1                    ***0***     					o_regf_error_type = I3C_SHORT_READ_Error ;  // target didn't send all requierd data 
    1102                                             					else 
    1103            1                    ***0***     					o_regf_error_type = SUCCESS ;
    1104                                             				end
    1105                                             				else 
    1106            1                    ***0***     				o_regf_error_type = SUCCESS ;
    1107                                             				
    1108                                             			end 
    1109                                             			else 
    1110            1                    ***0***     			o_regf_error_type = SUCCESS ;
    1111                                             			
    1112                                                      end
    1113                                             		 
    1114                                             		 
    1115                                             
    1116                                                          end 
    1117                                             
    1118                                             
    1119                                               abort_bit      : begin
    1120                                             
    1121                                                    if (i_regf_wr_rd_bit)
    1122                                                      begin
    1123                                             
    1124                                                       if (!i_frmcnt_last)  
    1125                                                         begin
    1126            1                    ***0***                   o_tx_en = 'b1;
    1127            1                    ***0***                   o_tx_mode = one_preamble; 
    1128                                                         end
    1129                                                       else
    1130                                                         begin
    1131            1                    ***0***                   o_tx_en = 'b1;
    1132            1                    ***0***                   o_tx_mode = zero_preamble;
    1133            1                    ***0***     			  o_regf_abort = 'b0;
    1134            1                    ***0***     	          o_regf_error_type = BUS_ABORTED_Error;  // Controller aborts reading
    1135                                                         end
    1136                                             
    1137                                                       end
    1138                                             
    1139                                                     else
    1140                                                      begin
    1141            1                    ***0***               o_rx_en = 'b1;
    1142            1                    ***0***               o_rx_mode = preamble;
    1143                                             
    1144                                             		  if(!i_rx_pre)  
    1145                                             		  begin 
    1146            1                    ***0***     		  o_regf_abort = 'b1;
    1147            1                    ***0***     		  o_regf_error_type = BUS_ABORTED_Error;   // target aborts writing 
    1148                                             		  end
    1149                                             		  
    1150                                             		  else 
    1151            1                    ***0***     		  o_regf_abort = 'b0;
    1152                                             
    1153                                                      end
    1154                                             
    1155                                                          end 
    1156                                             			 
    1157                                             			 
    1158                                             			 
    1159                                             		/*	 second_data_byte        : begin

    1176                                             
    1177

    1202

    1204                                                    
    1205                                             	 else

    1209                                             		  
    1210                                             
    1211                                             		  if ( i_rx_mode_done)		  
    1212                                             		  begin      		  
    1213                                             			if (i_rx_pre)

    1215                                             			else

    1217                                             		  
    1218                                                      end
    1219                                             		 else  
    1220            1                    ***0***     		 o_regf_error_type = SUCCESS ;
    1221                                             
    1222                                                          end  
    1223                                             			end
    1224                                             
    1225                                             
    1226                                             
    1227                                                token_crc_bits        : begin
    1228                                             
    1229                                                 if (!i_regf_wr_rd_bit)
    1230                                                      begin
    1231            1                    ***0***               o_tx_en = 'b1;
    1232            1                    ***0***               o_tx_mode = token_CRC;
    1233                                                      end
    1234                                                  else
    1235                                                      begin
    1236            1                    ***0***               o_rx_en = 'b1;
    1237            1                    ***0***               o_rx_mode = Check_token;
    1238                                             		  
    1239                                             		  if (i_rx_error)
    1240            1                    ***0***                 o_regf_error_type = Frame_Error;
    1241                                                       else
    1242            1                    ***0***                 o_regf_error_type = SUCCESS;
    1243                                                      end
    1244                                             
    1245                                                          end 			 
    1246                                             
    1247                                             
    1248                                                crc_value_bits   : begin
    1249                                             
    1250                                                 if (!i_regf_wr_rd_bit)
    1251                                                      begin
    1252            1                    ***0***               o_tx_en = 'b1;
    1253            1                    ***0***               o_tx_mode =  CRC_value ;
    1254                                             		if((i_bitcnt == 'd12) || (i_bitcnt == 'd11))
    1255                                             			begin 
    1256            1                    ***0***     			o_sclstall_en = 0;
    1257                                             			if(!i_regf_toc)
    1258            1                    ***0***     				o_sclstall_no_of_cycles = restart_stalling;
    1259                                             			else 
    1260            1                    ***0***     				o_sclstall_no_of_cycles = exit_stalling;
    1261                                             				
    1262                                             			end
    1263                                             		else 
    1264            1                    ***0***     			o_sclstall_en = 0;
    1265                                                      end
    1266                                                 else
    1267                                                      begin
    1268                                             
    1269            1                    ***0***               o_rx_en = 'b1;
    1270            1                    ***0***               o_rx_mode = Check_CRC_value;
    1271                                                       
    1272                                             		 
    1273                                             		 if (i_rx_error)
    1274            1                    ***0***                 o_regf_error_type = CRC_Error;
    1275                                                       else
    1276                                             			begin 
    1277            1                    ***0***     				o_regf_error_type = SUCCESS;
    1278                                             					if((i_bitcnt == 'd12) || (i_bitcnt == 'd11))
    1279                                             						begin 
    1280            1                    ***0***     						o_sclstall_en = 0;
    1281                                             						if(!i_regf_toc)
    1282            1                    ***0***     							o_sclstall_no_of_cycles = restart_stalling;
    1283                                             						else 
    1284            1                    ***0***     							o_sclstall_no_of_cycles = exit_stalling;
    1285                                             						end
    1286                                             					else 
    1287            1                    ***0***     						o_sclstall_en = 0;
    1288                                             			end
    1289                                             			
    1290                                             			
    1291                                             
    1292                                                      end
    1293                                             		 
    1294                                             		 
    1295                                             
    1296                                                          end 
    1297                                             
    1298                                             
    1299                                                error   : begin
    1300            1                    ***0***        				o_tx_en = 1'b0 ;
    1301            1                    ***0***               o_rx_en = 'b1;
    1302            1                    ***0***               o_rx_mode = Error;
    1303            1                    ***0***     		  o_bitcnt_rst = 'b1 ;
    1304                                             		  
    1305                                             		  
    1306                                             
    1307                                                          end
    1308                                             
    1309                                             
    1310                                                restart   : begin
    1311                                             
    1312            1                    ***0***               o_tx_en = 'b1;
    1313            1                    ***0***               o_tx_mode = Restart_Pattern;
    1314            1                    ***0***               o_sclstall_no_of_cycles = restart_stalling;
    1315                                             
    1316                                                       // badr 
    1317            1                    ***0***               if (i_sclstall_stall_done_strtch) o_sclstall_en = 'b0 ;
    1318            1                    ***0***     		   		else 	 		 											  o_sclstall_en = 'b1 ;
    1319                                             		   		//////////
    1320                                             
    1321                                             			if(i_tx_mode_done )
    1322            1                    ***0***     			 o_sclstall_en = 'b0;
    1323                                             		  else
    1324            1                    ***0***     			o_sclstall_en = 'b1;
    1325                                                          end
    1326                                             
    1327                                             
    1328                                                exit   : begin
    1329                                             
    1330            1                    ***0***               o_tx_en = 'b1;
    1331            1                    ***0***               o_tx_mode = Exit_Pattern;
    1332            1                    ***0***               o_sclstall_no_of_cycles = exit_stalling;
    1333            1                    ***0***               o_sclstall_en = 'b1;
    1334                                             		 
    1335                                             
    1336                                             
    1337                                                       // badr 
    1338            1                    ***0***               if (i_sclstall_stall_done_strtch) o_sclstall_en = 'b0 ;

    1340                                             		   		//////////
    1341                                             
    1342                                             
    1343

    1357                                             	
    1358

    17              1                          1           o_scl_stall <= 1'b0 ;

    19                                                   end

    2                                                module frame_counter(
    3                                                    input  wire        i_fcnt_clk         ,
    4                                                    input  wire        i_fcnt_rst_n       ,
    5                                                    input  wire        i_fcnt_en          ,
    6                                                    input  wire        i_regf_CMD_ATTR    ,     // HDR 1 bit only selects bit [0] (1 for immediate and 0 for regular)
    7                                                    input  wire [15:0] i_regf_DATA_LEN    ,     // HDR 
    8                                                    input  wire [2:0]  i_regf_DTT         ,     // HDR
    9                                                    input  wire [5:0]  i_cnt_bit_count    ,     // HDR
    10                                                   //input  wire        i_ccc_Direct_Broadcast_n ,     // HDR  1 for direct and 0 for Broadcast
    11                                                   input  wire        i_bitcnt_toggle    , 
    12                                                   output reg         o_cccnt_last_frame       // HDR
    13                                                   );
    14                                               	
    15              1                          1     reg [15:0] count = 16'd0 ;
    16                                               //wire       count_done   ;
    17

    19                                                       if (!i_fcnt_rst_n) begin 
    20              1                          1                 o_cccnt_last_frame = 1'b0 ;
    21              1                          1                 count              = 16'd0 ;
    22                                                       end 
    23                                                       else begin

    23                                               
    24                                               // tx modes needed  
    25                                               localparam [3:0]  special_preambles = 'b0000, 		//'d0			//2'b01 
    26                                                                 serializing_address = 'b0001, 	//'d1			//address of target
    27                                                   			  serializing_zeros = 'b0011 ,  	//'d3			//7-zeros in the first byte of cmd word        
    28                                                                 one = 'b0010, 					//'d2			// for representing preamble bit or reading_or_writing bit  
    29                                                                 zero = 'b0110, 					//'d6			// for representing preamble bit or reading_or_writing bit
    30                                               				  serializing_data = 'b0111, 		//'d7			//data byte from reg to be serialized
    31                                               				  CCC_value = 'b0101 , 				//'d5			//special data in case of transmitting CCC
    32                                               				  calculating_Parity = 'b0100,  	//'d4			//parity of word serialized either cmd word or data word
    33                                               				  token_CRC = 'b1100, 				//'d12			//special bits 4'b1100
    34                                               				  CRC_value = 'b1101, 				//'d13			//CRC value arrived of data serialized
    35                                                                 restart_Pattern = 'b1111,			//'d15

    47                                               wire [7:0] A; //CMD_Word_Second_Byte

    58

    72              1                      31958     	else rd_wr_flag_BADR = rd_wr_flag ;

    60

    90                                                   	if(DUT.frame_counter_hdr.o_cccnt_last_frame == 'b1) begin 
    91              1                      10000     			TOC_old = RAND_TOC ;
    92                                               		end

    95                                                   initial begin

    101             2                      10000     
    102                                              			assert(conf_obj.randomize());
    103

    126             1                      10000     			switch_muxes(Design);

    129

    131                                              			if (i == 0) begin 
    132             1                          1     				wait (DUT.enthdr_en);
