    134                                              				// write new configuration
    135             1                          1     				@(DUT.frame_counter_hdr.o_cccnt_last_frame == 'b1 && (DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state == PARITY_DATA || DUT.DDR_NT.current_state == parity));
    136             1                          1     				$display("this is testcase no. %d",i,$time);
    137                                              			end 
    138                                              
    139                                              			else if (TOC_old) begin
    140             1                       4860     				wait (DUT.enthdr_en); 
    141             1                       4860     				check_output(); // to check enthdr ccc output
    142                                              				// write new configuration
    143             1                       4860     				@(DUT.frame_counter_hdr.o_cccnt_last_frame == 'b1 && (DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state == PARITY_DATA || DUT.DDR_NT.current_state == parity));
    144             1                       4860     				#(4*SYS_CLK_PERIOD);
    145             1                       4860     				$display("this is testcase no. %d with TOC = 1 ",i,$time);
    146                                              		  	end 
    147                                              
    148                                              		  	else if (!TOC_old) begin 
    149             1                       5139     		  		@(DUT.frame_counter_hdr.o_cccnt_last_frame == 'b1 && (DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state == PARITY_DATA || DUT.DDR_NT.current_state == parity));
    150             1                       5139     		  		#(4*SYS_CLK_PERIOD);
    151             1                       5139     		  		$display("this is testcase no. %d with TOC = 0 ",i,$time);
    152                                              		  	end 
    153                                              		end	
    154                                              
    155                                              
    156                                              		//@(posedge (DUT.ccc_engine_done || DUT.ddr_engine_done ));
    157             1                          1     			$display("this is loop is done  %t",$time);
    158             1                          1     		#(50*SYS_CLK_PERIOD) ;
    159             1                          1     		$display("Coverage = %.2f%%",RAND_VALUES_instance.get_coverage());		
    160             1                          1     		$stop ;
    161                                              	end
    162                                              
    163                                              //////////////////////////////////////////////  General driver /////////////////////////////////
    164                                              
    165                                              	initial begin 
    166             1                          1     		forever #(2*SYS_CLK_PERIOD) begin 
    166             2                    1271443     
    167                                              
    168                                              			if (DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state == PRE_FIRST_DATA_TWO || DUT.DDR_NT.current_state == ack_waiting) begin 
    169             1                      16617     				@(negedge DUT.scl_neg_edge_not_stalled or negedge DUT.scl_pos_edge_not_stalled) ;
    170             1                      16617     				sda_drive = 1'b0 ;
    171             1                      16617     				#(2*SYS_CLK_PERIOD) ;
    172             1                      16617     				sda_drive = 1'bz ;
    173                                              			end
    174                                              			else if (!RAND_RnW && (DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state == PRE_DATA_TWO || DUT.DDR_NT.current_state == abort_bit)) begin 
    175             1                       4021     				@(negedge DUT.scl_neg_edge_not_stalled or negedge DUT.scl_pos_edge_not_stalled) ;
    176             1                       4021     				sda_drive = 1'b1 ;
    177             1                       4021     				#(2*SYS_CLK_PERIOD) ;
    178             1                       4021     				sda_drive = 1'bz ;
    179                                              			end
    180                                              		end
    181                                              	end 
    182                                              
    183                                                 
    184                                              	// deserialization checking 
    185                                              
    186             1                     230778     	always @(DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state) begin 
    187                                              		if ((DUT.CCC_Handler.i_engine_en && DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state == RNW) || (DUT.DDR_NT.i_engine_en && DUT.DDR_NT.current_state == Read_Write_bit)) begin 
    188             1                      16618     			#(SYS_CLK_PERIOD) ;
    189             1                      16618     			check_cmd_word();
    190                                              		end 
    191                                              	end 
    192                                              
    193             1                     267248     	always @(DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state) begin 
    194                                              		if (DUT.CCC_Handler.i_engine_en && DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state == CCC_BYTE) begin 
    195             1                      10000     			#(SYS_CLK_PERIOD) ;
    196             1                      10000     			check_CCC_value_data_word();
    197                                              		end 
    198                                              	end
    199                                              
    200             1                     277175     	always @(DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state or DUT.DDR_NT.current_state) begin 
    201                                              		if (DUT.cccnt_RnW == 0 && (DUT.CCC_Handler.i_engine_en && DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state == FIRST_DATA_BYTE) || (DUT.DDR_NT.i_engine_en && DUT.DDR_NT.current_state == first_data_byte)) begin 
    202             1                       6691     			#(SYS_CLK_PERIOD) ;
    203             1                       6691     			check_repeated_data_word();
    204                                              		end 
    205                                              	end
    206                                              
    207                                              	reg [28:0] read_vector_2_1 = 29'b0000_0000_0000_0000_01_01_1100_00001 ;
    208                                              	reg [28:0] read_vector_2_2 = 29'b1111_1111_1111_1111_01_01_1100_01010 ;
    209                                              	reg [28:0] read_vector_2_3 = 29'b1010_1010_1010_1010_01_01_1100_10000 ;
    210                                              	reg [28:0] read_vector_2_4 = 29'b1111_0000_1111_0000_01_01_1100_11001 ;
    211                                              	reg [49:0] read_vector_4_1 = 50'b0000_0000_1000_0001_10_1zz_0011_1111_1111_1111_10_01_1100_10100 ;
    212                                              	reg [70:0] read_vector_6_1 = 71'b1010_1010_1010_1010_01_1zz_1111_1111_1111_1110_00_1zz_0000_0010_1111_0000_11_01_1100_01100 ;
    213                                              	reg [70:0] read_vector_6_2 = 71'b0000_1111_0000_1000_11_1zz_1111_1111_0000_0000_01_1zz_0011_1100_0000_1111_01_01_1100_10001 ;
    214                                              
    215             1                     285465     	always @(DUT.CCC_Handler.next_state or DUT.DDR_NT.next_state) begin 
    216                                              		if ( (DUT.cccnt_RnW == 1 ) && (RAND_CMD_ATTR == 'd0) && ({RAND_DATA_FOUR,RAND_DATA_THREE} == 'd2 || {RAND_DATA_FOUR,RAND_DATA_THREE} == 'd1 ) && ((DUT.CCC_Handler.i_engine_en && DUT.CCC_Handler.next_state == FIRST_DATA_BYTE) || (DUT.DDR_NT.i_engine_en && DUT.DDR_NT.next_state == first_data_byte))) begin 
    217             1                       1964     			Drive_repeated_data_word_2();
    218                                              		end 
    219                                              	end
    220                                              
    221             1                     286139     	always @(DUT.CCC_Handler.next_state or DUT.DDR_NT.next_state) begin 
    222                                              		if ( (DUT.cccnt_RnW == 1 ) && (RAND_CMD_ATTR == 'd0) && ({RAND_DATA_FOUR,RAND_DATA_THREE} == 'd3 || {RAND_DATA_FOUR,RAND_DATA_THREE} == 'd4 ) && ((DUT.CCC_Handler.i_engine_en && DUT.CCC_Handler.next_state == FIRST_DATA_BYTE) || (DUT.DDR_NT.i_engine_en && DUT.DDR_NT.next_state == first_data_byte))) begin 
    223             1                       1010     			Drive_repeated_data_word_4();
    224                                              		end 
    225                                              	end
    226                                              
    227             1                     281681     	always @(DUT.CCC_Handler.next_state or DUT.DDR_NT.next_state) begin 
    228                                              		if ( (DUT.cccnt_RnW == 1 ) && (RAND_CMD_ATTR == 'd0) && ({RAND_DATA_FOUR,RAND_DATA_THREE} == 'd6 ) && ((DUT.CCC_Handler.i_engine_en && DUT.CCC_Handler.next_state == FIRST_DATA_BYTE) || (DUT.DDR_NT.i_engine_en && DUT.DDR_NT.next_state == first_data_byte))) begin 
    229             1                        973     			Drive_repeated_data_word_6();
    230                                              		end 
    231                                              	end
    232                                              
    233                                              	task Drive_repeated_data_word_2 (); // check read commands
    234                                              		begin 
    235                                              			int 		 o ; // counter
    236             1                       1964     			#(CLK_PERIOD);
    237             1                       1964     			for ( o = 0 ; o < 'd29 ; o++ ) begin 
    237             2                      56956     
    238                                              
    239             1                      56956     				@ (negedge DUT.scl_neg_edge_not_stalled or negedge DUT.scl_pos_edge_not_stalled ) ;
    240             1                      56956     				sda_drive = read_vector_2_2[28 - o];
    241             1                      56956     				# (3*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    242                                               
    243                                              			end
    244             1                       1964     			sda_drive = 1'bz ;
    245             1                       1964     			# (4*SYS_CLK_PERIOD) ;
    246                                              
    247                                              			if (TOC_old) begin 
    248                                              				assert (DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state == EXIT_PATTERN) $display("READ data word TOC = 1 is CORRECT : %0t" ,$time);
    249                                              				else 												   $display("READ data word TOC = 1 is WRONG   : %0t" ,$time);
    250                                              			end 
    251                                              			else if (!TOC_old) begin 
    252                                              				assert (DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state == RESTART_PATTERN) $display("READ data word TOC = 0 is CORRECT : %0t" ,$time);
    253                                              				else 												   	  $display("READ data word TOC = 0 is WRONG   : %0t" ,$time);
    254                                              			end 
    255                                              		end  
    256                                              	endtask 
    257                                              
    258                                              
    259                                              	task Drive_repeated_data_word_4 (); // check read commands
    260                                              		begin 
    261                                              			int 		 o ; // counter
    262             1                       1010     			#(CLK_PERIOD);
    263             1                       1010     			for ( o = 0 ; o < 'd50 ; o++ ) begin 
    263             2                      50500     
    264                                              
    265             1                      50500     				@ (negedge DUT.scl_neg_edge_not_stalled or negedge DUT.scl_pos_edge_not_stalled ) ;
    266             1                      50500     				sda_drive = read_vector_4_1[49 - o];
    267             1                      50500     				# (3*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    268                                               
    269                                              			end
    270             1                       1010     			sda_drive = 1'bz ;
    271             1                       1010     			# (4*SYS_CLK_PERIOD) ;
    272                                              
    273                                              			if (TOC_old) begin 
    274                                              				assert (DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state == EXIT_PATTERN) $display("READ data word TOC = 1 is CORRECT : %0t" ,$time);
    275                                              				else 												   $display("READ data word TOC = 1 is WRONG   : %0t" ,$time);
    276                                              			end 
    277                                              			else if (!TOC_old) begin 
    278                                              				assert (DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state == RESTART_PATTERN) $display("READ data word TOC = 0 is CORRECT : %0t" ,$time);
    279                                              				else 												   	  $display("READ data word TOC = 0 is WRONG   : %0t" ,$time);
    280                                              			end 
    281                                              		end  
    282                                              	endtask 
    283                                              
    284                                              
    285                                              	task Drive_repeated_data_word_6 (); // check read commands
    286                                              		begin 
    287                                              			int 		 o ; // counter
    288             1                        973     			#(CLK_PERIOD);
    289             1                        973     			for ( o = 0 ; o < 'd71 ; o++ ) begin 
    289             2                      69083     
    290                                              
    291             1                      69083     				@ (negedge DUT.scl_neg_edge_not_stalled or negedge DUT.scl_pos_edge_not_stalled ) ;
    292             1                      69083     				sda_drive = read_vector_6_2[70 - o];
    293             1                      69083     				# (3*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    294                                               
    295                                              			end
    296             1                        973     			sda_drive = 1'bz ;
    297             1                        973     			# (4*SYS_CLK_PERIOD) ;
    298                                              
    299                                              			if (TOC_old) begin 
    300                                              				assert (DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state == EXIT_PATTERN) $display("READ data word TOC = 1 is CORRECT : %0t" ,$time);
    301                                              				else 												   $display("READ data word TOC = 1 is WRONG   : %0t" ,$time);
    302                                              			end 
    303                                              			else if (!TOC_old) begin 
    304                                              				assert (DUT.CCC_Handler.current_state == RESTART_PATTERN) $display("READ data word TOC = 0 is CORRECT : %0t" ,$time);
    305                                              				else 												   	  $display("READ data word TOC = 0 is WRONG   : %0t" ,$time);
    306                                              			end 
    307                                              		end  
    308                                              	endtask 
    309                                              
    310                                              
    311                                              	task check_cmd_word (); 
    312                                              		begin 
    313                                              			logic [17:0] collected_cmd_wrd ;
    314                                              			bit 	     parity_adj_7e ,parity_adj ,P1_cmd_sel ,P0_cmdword , P1_cmd_ind ;
    315                                              			bit   [17:0] correct_first_cmd_word , correct_cmd_word ;
    316                                              			int 		 o ; // counter
    317                                              
    318             1                      16618     			for ( o = 0 ; o < 'd18 ; o++ ) begin 
    318             2                     299111     
    319                                              
    320             1                     299112     			@ (posedge DUT.scl_pos_edge or posedge DUT.scl_neg_edge ) ;
    321                                              
    322             1                     299111     				collected_cmd_wrd['d17- o] = sda_tb ;
    323                                              
    324             1                     299111     				parity_adj    = collected_cmd_wrd[16] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[14] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[12] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[10] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[8] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[6] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[4]  ;
    325             1                     299111     				P1_cmd_sel    = DUT.CCC_Handler.i_regf_RnW ^ collected_cmd_wrd[9] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[7] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[5] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[3] ; // index is shifted by 2 as this is the 18 bit word (data + parity)
    326             1                     299111     				P1_cmd_ind 	  = 1'b0 ^ collected_cmd_wrd[9] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[7] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[5] ^ collected_cmd_wrd[3] ; // index is shifted by 2 as this is the 18 bit word (data + parity)
    327             1                     299111     				P0_cmdword    =  1 ;
    328                                              
    329             1                     299111     				correct_first_cmd_word = {1'b0 			, 7'd0 , 7'b111_1110 					        , parity_adj , P1_cmd_ind , P0_cmdword } ;
    330             1                     299111     				correct_cmd_word 	   = {DUT.cccnt_RnW , 7'd0 , DUT.cccnt_tx_special_data_mux_out[6:0] , parity_adj , P1_cmd_sel , P0_cmdword } ;
    331                                              
    332             1                     299111     				# (2*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    333                                              				if (o == 'd17) begin 
    334                                              					if (DUT.CCC_Handler.i_engine_en && (DUT.CCC_Handler.first_time || !DUT.CCC_Handler.Direct_Broadcast_n_del)) begin  // this is a 7E cmd word
    335                                              						assert (correct_first_cmd_word == collected_cmd_wrd) $display("first command word in CCC is CORRECT : %0t" ,$time);
    336                                              						else 												 $display("first command word in CCC is WRONG   : %0t" ,$time);
    337                                              					end 
    338                                              					else begin 	// this is an address word  
    339                                              						assert (correct_cmd_word == collected_cmd_wrd) $display("second command word is CORRECT : %0t" ,$time);
    340                                              						else 										   $display("second command word is WRONG   : %0t" ,$time);
    341                                              					end 
    342                                              				end  
    343                                              			end 
    344                                              		end  
    345                                              	endtask 
    346                                              
    347                                              
    348                                              	task check_CCC_value_data_word (); 
    349                                              		begin 
    350                                              			logic [17:0] collected_data_wrd ;
    351                                              			bit 	     P1 ,P0 ;
    352                                              			bit   [17:0] correct_first_data_word  ;
    353                                              			int 		 o ; // counter 
    354                                              
    355             1                      10000     			for ( o = 0 ; o < 'd18 ; o++ ) begin 
    355             2                     180000     
    356                                              
    357             1                     180000     			@ (posedge DUT.scl_pos_edge or posedge DUT.scl_neg_edge ) ;
    358                                              
    359             1                     180000     				collected_data_wrd['d17- o] = sda_tb ;
    360                                              
    361                                              				//$display("vlaue of SDA line is  %b : %t",sda_tb,$time);
    362                                              
    363             1                     180000     				P1 = collected_data_wrd[17] ^ collected_data_wrd[15] ^ collected_data_wrd[13] ^ collected_data_wrd[11] ^ collected_data_wrd[9] ^
    364                                              				 	 collected_data_wrd[7] ^ collected_data_wrd[5] ^ collected_data_wrd[3] ;
    365                                              
    366             1                     180000     				P0 = collected_data_wrd[16] ^ collected_data_wrd[14] ^ collected_data_wrd[12] ^ collected_data_wrd[10] ^ collected_data_wrd[8] ^
    367                                              					 collected_data_wrd[6] ^ collected_data_wrd[4] ^ collected_data_wrd[2] ^ 1 ; 
    368                                              
    369             1                     180000     				correct_first_data_word = { DUT.CCC_Handler.o_txrx_addr_ccc , 8'd0 ,  P1 , P0 } ;
    370                                              
    371             1                     180000     				# (2*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    372                                              				if (o == 'd17) begin 
    373                                              					assert (correct_first_data_word == collected_data_wrd) $display("CCC data word is CORRECT : %0t" ,$time);
    374                                              					else 												   $display("CCC data word is WRONG   : %0t" ,$time);
    375                                              				end  
    376                                              			end 
    377                                              		end  
    378                                              	endtask 
    379                                              
    380                                              
    381                                              
    382                                              	task check_repeated_data_word (); 
    383                                              		begin 
    384                                              			logic [17:0] collected_data_wrd ;
    385                                              			bit 	     P1 ,P0 ;
    386                                              			bit   [17:0] correct_repeated_data_word  ;
    387                                              			int 		 o ;
    388                                              			bit   [7:0] tmp_D1 , tmp_D0 ;
    389                                              
    390             1                       6691     			for ( o = 0 ; o < 'd18 ; o++ ) begin 
    390             2                     120438     
    391                                              
    392             1                     120438     			@ (posedge DUT.scl_pos_edge or posedge DUT.scl_neg_edge ) ;
    393                                              
    394             1                     120438     				collected_data_wrd['d17- o] = sda_tb ;
    395                                              
    396                                              				//$display("vlaue of SDA line is  %b : %t",sda_tb,$time);
    397                                              
    398             1                     120438     				P1 = correct_repeated_data_word[17] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[15] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[13] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[11] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[9] ^
    399                                              				 	 correct_repeated_data_word[7] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[5] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[3] ;
    400                                              
    401             1                     120438     				P0 = correct_repeated_data_word[16] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[14] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[12] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[10] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[8] ^
    402                                              					 correct_repeated_data_word[6] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[4] ^ correct_repeated_data_word[2] ^ 1 ; 
    403                                              
    404                                              				if (o == 'd3) begin                            // any arbitrary value btn 0 -> 7
    405             1                       6691     					tmp_D1 = DUT.regf_data_rd ; 
    406                                              				end
    407                                              	
    408                                              				if (o == 'd10) begin 	 	 	 	 	 	   // any arbitrary value btn 8 -> 15
    409             1                       6691     					tmp_D0 = DUT.regf_data_rd ;
    410                                              				end 
    411                                              
    412             1                     120438     				correct_repeated_data_word = { tmp_D1 , tmp_D0 , P1 , P0 };
    413                                              
    414             1                     120438     				# (2*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    415                                              				if (o == 'd17) begin 
    416             1                       6691     					correct_repeated_data_word = { tmp_D1 , tmp_D0 , P1 , P0 };
    417                                              					assert (correct_repeated_data_word == collected_data_wrd) $display("repeated data word is CORRECT : %0t" ,$time);
    418                                              					else 													  $display("repeated data word is WRONG   : %0t" ,$time);
    419                                              				end  
    420                                              			end 
    421                                              		end  
    422                                              	endtask 
    423                                              
    424                                              
    425                                              pullup(sda_tb);
    426                                              //-----------------------------     Tasks       -------------------------------------//
    427                                              
    428                                              task reset;
    429                                              	begin
    430             1                          1     	    i_sdr_rst_n_tb 		        = 1'b1;
    431             1                          1     		# (SYS_CLK_PERIOD)
    432             1                          1     		i_sdr_rst_n_tb 				= 1'b0; // activated
    433             1                          1     		# (SYS_CLK_PERIOD)
    434             1                          1     		i_sdr_rst_n_tb 				= 1'b1; // de-activated
    435                                              
    436                                              	end	
    437                                              	endtask
    438                                              
    439                                              task initialize; 
    440                                              	begin
    441             1                          1     		i_sdr_clk_tb 				= 1'b0;
    442             1                          1     		i_sdr_rst_n_tb 				= 1'b1;
    443             1                          1     		i_i3c_i2c_sel_tb        	= 1'b1;  //i3c mode
    444             1                          1     		i_controller_en_tb      	= 1'b0;
    445             1                          1     		i_ccc_en_dis_hj_tb      	= 1'b0;
    446             1                          1     		sda_drive 					= 1'bz;
    447             1                          1     		i_data_config_mux_sel_tb    = 1'b1;
    448             1                          1     		i_regf_rd_en_config_tb   	= 1'b0;								
    449             1                          1         	i_regf_wr_en_config_tb   	= 1'b1;
    450                                              
    451                                              	end
    452                                              	endtask
    453                                              
    454                                              task switch_muxes(input selector);
    455                                                      begin 
    456             1                      20000                 i_data_config_mux_sel_tb = selector ; // 1 for configuration and 0 for design 
    457                                                      end 
    458                                                  endtask 
    459                                              
    460                                              task write_configurations();
    461                                              	begin
    462                                              
    463                                              //1.write randomized values
    464                                              	// DWORD0
    465             1                      10000     	@(negedge sys_clk) ;
    466             1                      10000     	 	i_regf_wr_en_config_tb = 1'b1;
    467             1                      10000     	 #(SYS_CLK_PERIOD)																		    																									; 
    468             1                      10000     		i_regf_config_tb     = { RAND_CMD[0] , RAND_TID , RAND_CMD_ATTR }  			 		;
    469             1                      10000         	i_regf_wr_address_config_tb = config_location 																												;
    470                                                  	    
    471             1                      10000           #(SYS_CLK_PERIOD)  																																											; 
    472             1                      10000     		i_regf_config_tb     = { RAND_CP , RAND_CMD[7:1] } 									;
    473             1                      10000         	i_regf_wr_address_config_tb = config_location + 'd1 																									;
    474                                              
    475             1                      10000           #(SYS_CLK_PERIOD)  																																											; 
    476             1                      10000     		i_regf_config_tb     = { RAND_DTT[0] , RAND_RESERVED , RAND_DEV_INDEX }  			;		    
    477             1                      10000         	i_regf_wr_address_config_tb = config_location + 'd2 																									;
    478                                              
    479             1                      10000           #(SYS_CLK_PERIOD)  																																											; 
    480             1                      10000     		i_regf_config_tb     = { RAND_TOC , RAND_WROC , RAND_RnW ,RAND_MODE , RAND_DTT[2:1]} ;
    481             1                      10000         	i_regf_wr_address_config_tb = config_location + 'd3 																									;
    482                                              
    483                                                    // DWORD 1
    484             1                      10000            #(SYS_CLK_PERIOD)  																																									  ; 
    485             1                      10000     		i_regf_config_tb     = RAND_DEF_BYTE     																														;
    486             1                      10000         	i_regf_wr_address_config_tb  = config_location + 'd4 																									;		
    487                                              
    488             1                      10000            #(SYS_CLK_PERIOD)  																																										; 
    489             1                      10000     		i_regf_config_tb     = RAND_DATA_TWO     																														;
    490             1                      10000         	i_regf_wr_address_config_tb  = config_location + 'd5 																									;
    491                                              
    492             1                      10000            #(SYS_CLK_PERIOD); 																		 
    493             1                      10000     		i_regf_config_tb     = RAND_DATA_THREE     																													;
    494             1                      10000         	i_regf_wr_address_config_tb  = config_location + 'd6 																									;
    495                                              
    496             1                      10000            #(SYS_CLK_PERIOD)  																																										; 
    497             1                      10000     		i_regf_config_tb     = RAND_DATA_FOUR     																														;
    498             1                      10000         	i_regf_wr_address_config_tb  = config_location + 'd7 																									;
    499                                                
    500             1                      10000             #(SYS_CLK_PERIOD) 																																											;
    501                                              	end
    502                                              endtask : write_configurations
    503                                              
    504                                              
    505                                              task check_output ();
    506                                              	begin
    507                                              		logic [7:0] BROADCAST; // 7'h7E+ R/w bit
    508                                              		logic [8:0] ENTHDR0; 
    509                                              
    510             1                       4861     		BROADCAST = 8'b0; // 7'h7E+ R/w bit
    511             1                       4861     		ENTHDR0 = 9'b0;
    512                                              
    513             1                       4861     			for(int i=0; i < 8 ; i++)   //receive first 8 bits of 7E and write bit
    513             2                      38888     
    514                                              			 	begin  
    515             1                      38888     				   @(posedge scl_tb)
    516             1                      38888     				   	BROADCAST['d7 - i] = sda_tb;
    517                                              			 	end
    518                                              
    519             1                       4861     			@(negedge scl_tb)
    520                                              			assert (BROADCAST == EXPECTED_BROADCAST) $display("Broadcast frame is RECIEVED");
    521                                              			else 									 $display("Broadcast frame is WRONG");
    522             1                       4861     					send_ack();
    523                                              			 
    524                                              
    525             1                       4861     			for(int i=0; i < 9 ; i++)   //receive first 8 bits of 7E and write bit
    525             2                      43749     
    526                                              			 	begin  
    527             1                      43749     				   @(posedge scl_tb)
    528             1                      43749     				   	ENTHDR0['d8 - i] = sda_tb;
    529                                              			 	end
    530                                               
    531                                              
    532                                              			assert (ENTHDR0 == EXPECTED_ENTHDR0) $display("ENTHDR frame is RECIEVED");
    533                                              			else 								 $display("ENTHDR frame is WRONG");			
    534                                              
    535                                              	   		
    536                                              		
    537                                              	end 
    538                                              endtask
    539                                              
    540                                              task send_ack;
    541                                                  begin 
    542             1                       4861             #(SYS_CLK_PERIOD)
    543                                                      if(!scl_tb) begin
    544             1                       4861             	sda_drive = 1'b0; //ack bit
    545             1                       4861             	#(4*SYS_CLK_PERIOD) ;
    546             1                       4861             	sda_drive =  1'bz ;
    547                                                  	end
    548                                                  end 
    549                                              endtask
    550                                              
    551                                              
    552                                              //-----------------------------DUT Instantiation-------------------------------------//
    553                                              I3C_TOP DUT (
    554                                               .i_sdr_clk           		(i_sdr_clk_tb)					, 
    555                                               .i_sdr_rst_n         		(i_sdr_rst_n_tb)				, 
    556                                               .i_controller_en     		(i_controller_en_tb)			, 
    557                                               .i_i3c_i2c_sel       		(i_i3c_i2c_sel_tb)				, 
    558                                               .i_ccc_en_dis_hj     		(i_ccc_en_dis_hj_tb)			, 
    559                                               .i_regf_config             (i_regf_config_tb)				,
    560                                               .i_data_config_mux_sel     (i_data_config_mux_sel_tb)		,    
    561                                               .i_regf_wr_address_config  (i_regf_wr_address_config_tb)	,
    562                                               .i_regf_wr_en_config       (i_regf_wr_en_config_tb)		,
    563                                               .i_regf_rd_en_config       (i_regf_rd_en_config_tb)        ,   
    564                                               .sda                 		(sda_tb)						,
    565                                               .scl                 		(scl_tb)						,
    566                                               .o_sdr_rx_valid      		(o_sdr_rx_valid_tb)				,
    567                                               .o_ctrl_done               (o_ctrl_done_tb)
    568                                               );
    569                                              
    570                                              //-------------------------------------- Assertions ---------------------------------------//
    571                                              	//assign sys_clk_50mhzzz = DUT.sys_clk_50mhz ;
    572                                              /*
    573                                              	property EXIT_and_stop_pattern ;
    574                                              		@(posedge DUT.sys_clk_50mhz) (!scl_tb) [*3] |-> $fell(sda_tb) [*4] ##1 (!sda_tb && scl_tb) ##1 (sda_tb && scl_tb) ;
    575                                              	endproperty
    576                                              */
    577                                              	property EXIT_and_stop_pattern ;
    578                                              		disable iff (!i_sdr_rst_n_tb) 
    579                                              		@(posedge DUT.sys_clk_50mhz)
    580                                              		(DUT.tx_mode_hdr_mux_out == exit_pattern && ($past(DUT.tx_mode_hdr_mux_out) != exit_pattern )) |=> 
    581                                              																				   (!scl_tb &&  sda_tb) ##2
    582                                              																				   (!scl_tb && !sda_tb) ##2
    583                                              																				   (!scl_tb &&  sda_tb) ##2 
    584                                              																				   (!scl_tb && !sda_tb) ##2 
    585                                              																				   (!scl_tb &&  sda_tb) ##2 
    586                                              																				   (!scl_tb && !sda_tb) ##2
    587                                              																				   (!scl_tb &&  sda_tb) ##2 
    588                                              																				   (!scl_tb && !sda_tb) ##1
    589                                              																				   ( scl_tb && !sda_tb) ##1 
    590                                              																				   ( scl_tb &&  sda_tb)     ;
    591                                              	endproperty
    592                                              
    593                                              
    594                                              	property Middle_Restart_pattern ;
    595                                              		disable iff (!i_sdr_rst_n_tb) 
    596                                              		@(posedge DUT.sys_clk_50mhz)
    597                                              		(!DUT.frmcnt_last_frame_hdr && DUT.ccc_tx_mode == restart_pattern && ($past(DUT.ccc_tx_mode) != restart_pattern )) |-> 
    598                                              																										##2
    599                                              																				   (!scl_tb &&  sda_tb) ##2
    600                                              																				   (!scl_tb && !sda_tb) ##2
    601                                              																				   (!scl_tb &&  sda_tb) ##2 
    602                                              																				   (!scl_tb && !sda_tb) ##1 
    603                                              																				   (!scl_tb &&  sda_tb) ##1 
    604                                              																				   ( scl_tb &&  sda_tb)     ;
    605                                              	endproperty
    606                                              
    607                                              	property Last_Restart_pattern ;
    608                                              		disable iff (!i_sdr_rst_n_tb) 
    609                                              		@(posedge DUT.sys_clk_50mhz)
    610                                              		(DUT.frmcnt_last_frame_hdr && DUT.tx_mode_hdr_mux_out == restart_pattern && ($past(DUT.tx_mode_hdr_mux_out) != restart_pattern )) |-> 
    611                                              																										##2
    612                                              																				   (!scl_tb &&  sda_tb) ##2
    613                                              																				   (!scl_tb && !sda_tb) ##2
    614                                              																				   (!scl_tb &&  sda_tb) ##2 
    615                                              																				   (!scl_tb && !sda_tb) ##1 
    616                                              																				   (!scl_tb &&  sda_tb) ##1 
    617                                              																				   ( scl_tb &&  sda_tb) ##1 
    618                                              																				   ( scl_tb &&  sda_tb) ##1
    619                                              																				   (!scl_tb &&  sda_tb)		;
    620                                              	endproperty
    621                                              
    622                                              
    623                                              	assert property(EXIT_and_stop_pattern) 
    624                                              							$display("%t EXIT_and_stop_pattern SUCCEEDED ",$time); else
    625                                                                          $display("%t EXIT_and_stop_pattern FAILED    ",$time);
    626                                              
    627                                                  assert property(Middle_Restart_pattern) 
    628                                              							$display("%t Middle_Restart_pattern SUCCEEDED ",$time); else
    629                                                                          $display("%t Middle_Restart_pattern FAILED    ",$time);
    630                                              
    631                                                  assert property(Last_Restart_pattern) 
    632                                              							$display("%t Last_Restart_pattern SUCCEEDED ",$time); else
    633                                                                          $display("%t Last_Restart_pattern FAILED    ",$time);
    634                                              
    635                                              
    636                                              
    637                                              	covergroup RAND_VALUES @(posedge i_sdr_clk_tb) ;
    638                                               
    639                                              		RAND_CMD_ATTR_cp : coverpoint RAND_CMD_ATTR iff (i_sdr_rst_n_tb)
    640                                              		{
    641                                              			bins regular_0   = {0};
    642                                              			bins immediate_1 = {1};
    643                                              		}
    644                                              
    645                                              		RAND_CMD_immediate_cp : coverpoint RAND_CMD iff (i_sdr_rst_n_tb)
    646                                              		{
    647                                              			bins ENEC_D_bin      = {8'h80};
    648                                              			bins DISEC_D_bin     = {8'h81};
    649                                              			bins SETMWL_D_bin    = {8'h89};
    650                                              			bins SETMRL_D_bin    = {8'h8A};
    651                                              			
    652                                              			bins ENEC_B_bin      = {8'h00};
    653                                              			bins DISEC_B_bin     = {8'h01};
    654                                              			bins SETMWL_B_bin    = {8'h09};
    655                                              			bins SETMRL_B_bin    = {8'h0A};
    656                                              			bins Dummy_B_bin     = {8'h1F};
    657                                              			
    658                                              		}
    659                                              
    660                                              		RAND_CMD_regular_cp : coverpoint RAND_CMD iff (i_sdr_rst_n_tb)
    661                                              		{
    662                                              			
    663                                              			bins GETMWL_D_bin    = {8'h8B};
    664                                              			bins GETMRL_D_bin    = {8'h8C};
    665                                              			bins GETSTATUS_D_bin = {8'h90};
    666                                              			bins GETBCR_D_bin    = {8'h8E};
    667                                              			bins GETDCR_D_bin    = {8'h8F};
    668                                              			
    669                                              		}
    670                                              
    671                                              		RAND_CP_cp : coverpoint RAND_CP iff (i_sdr_rst_n_tb)
    672                                              		{
    673                                              			//bins Normal_transaction_bin = {0};
    674                                              			bins CCC_Handler_bin 		= {1};
    675                                              		}
    676                                              		
    677                                              		RAND_DEV_INDEX_cp : coverpoint RAND_DEV_INDEX iff (i_sdr_rst_n_tb)
    678                                              		{
    679                                              			bins low  = {[0:8]};
    680                                              			bins mid  = {[9:20]};
    681                                              			bins high = {[21:31]};
    682                                              		}
    683                                              
    684                                              		RAND_DTT_cp : coverpoint RAND_DTT iff (i_sdr_rst_n_tb)
    685                                              		{
    686                                              			bins no_def_byte_0 = {0};
    687                                              			bins no_def_byte_1 = {1};
    688                                              			bins no_def_byte_2 = {2};
    689                                              			//bins no_def_byte_3 = {3};
    690                                              			//bins no_def_byte_4 = {4};
    691                                              
    692                                              			//ignore_bins def_byte [] = {[5:7]};
    693                                              		}
    694                                              
    695                                              		RAND_MODE_cp : coverpoint RAND_MODE iff (i_sdr_rst_n_tb)
    696                                              		{
    697                                              			bins HDR_mode_bin = {6};
    698                                              			illegal_bins none =  default ;
    699                                              		}
    700                                              
    701                                              		RAND_RnW_cp : coverpoint RAND_RnW iff (i_sdr_rst_n_tb)
    702                                              		{
    703                                              			bins Write  = {0} ;
    704                                              			bins Read   = {1} ;
    705                                              		}
    706                                              
    707                                              		RAND_TOC_cp : coverpoint RAND_TOC iff (i_sdr_rst_n_tb)
    708                                              		{
    709                                              			bins exit_patt    = {1} ;
    710                                              			bins restart_patt = {0} ;
    711                                              		}
    712                                              
    713                                              		RAND_DATA_THREE_cp : coverpoint RAND_DATA_THREE iff (i_sdr_rst_n_tb)
    714                                              		{
    715                                              			bins DATA_LEN_1 = {1} ;
    716                                              			bins DATA_LEN_2 = {2} ;
    717                                              			//bins DATA_LEN_3 = {3} ;
    718                                              			//bins DATA_LEN_4 = {4} ;
    719                                              		}
    720                                              
    721                                              		RAND_DATA_FOUR_cp : coverpoint RAND_DATA_FOUR iff (i_sdr_rst_n_tb)
    722                                              		{
    723                                              			bins ZERO = {0} ;
    724                                              		}
    725                                              		
    726                                              		cr1 : cross RAND_CMD_ATTR_cp , RAND_CMD_immediate_cp {
    727                                              			ignore_bins regular = binsof(RAND_CMD_ATTR_cp) intersect {0};
    728                                              		}
    729                                              
    730                                              		cr2 : cross  RAND_CMD_ATTR_cp , RAND_CMD_regular_cp {
    731                                              			ignore_bins immediate = binsof(RAND_CMD_ATTR_cp) intersect {1};
    732                                              		}
    733                                              	
    734                                              		engine_odd : coverpoint DUT.engine_odd iff (i_sdr_rst_n_tb && ((RAND_DTT == 1) || (RAND_DTT == 3) || {RAND_DATA_THREE,RAND_DATA_FOUR} %2 == 1))
    735                                              		{
    736                                              			bins ENGINE_ODD     = {1} ;
    737                                              			bins ENGINE_ODD_not = {0} ;
    738                                              		}
    739                                              
    740                                              
    741                                              
    742                                              
    743                                              
    744                                              
    745

    755                                              /*

    758                                              			 							 binsof (RAND_CMD_immediate_cp) intersect {8'h81,8'h89,8'h8A,8'h00,8'h01,8'h09,8'h0A,8'h1F} ;
    759                                              		}
    760                                              
    761                                              */
    762                                              	    endgroup
